FAST, EASY AND SECURE
A BRP exclusive, LinQ is a tool-less system 
for near-instant installation of accessories.
• LinQ accessories to transform your machine to fit the moment.
• No tools needed: quickly install and remove accessories by hand.
• Stylish, fully integrated solution to your cargo needs.
• Sturdy mounting system that holds up in every terrain.
LinQ is the industry standard in fast, secure and easy 
accessory attachment. Here’s how you can use multiple 
LinQ items together to create the perfect ride.

messages.content:
Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2025 specification page:

TOE-HOLDS, FOOTRESTS  
& KNEE PADS
TOE-HOLDS
FOOTRESTS
*While supplies last.
ADJUSTABLE TOE-HOLDS 
REV Gen4 16” Summit (except Neo), Freeride, Backcountry and 
Expedition 16”
860201765
•	 Die-cast aluminum part.
•	 Allows user to adjust toe-hold position for different riding 
styles and control.
•	 Foldable for easy floorboard access.
•	 Adjustable 3” (7.6 cm) rearward and 1.5” (3.8 cm) upward.
•	 Forward/backward and top/down adjustments.
TUNNEL GRIP PLATES
Fit all models (except Youth)
860200164
•	 Lightweight plastic grip plates for extra side boot grip  
in rough riding conditions.
•	 Developed for the 600 Race sled.
•	 Sold in pairs with complete hardware.
ADJUSTABLE TOE-HOLDS
REV Gen4 MXZ, Renegade, Neo and Grand Touring 
860201305*
•	 Adjustable solid toe-holds (non-folding).
•	 Provide 0.6” (1.5 cm) vertical and 1.6” (4 cm) horizontal 
adjustment range.
•	 Work with both size rubber shims and Lateral Footrests 
(860202656).
FIXED TOE-HOLDS 
REV Gen4 Summit (except Neo), Freeride and Backcountry
860201510
•	 Fixed toe-holds for control and leverage when 
boondocking.
SHIM KIT FOR TOE-HOLDS 
REV Gen5 (Trail, Crossover), REV Gen4 (Narrow) MXZ Neo and Renegade
860201408
•	 Spacers in two heights (10 mm, 20 mm) let you determine 
how tight your boots fit the toe-holds.
FIXED TOE-HOLDS
REV Gen5 (MXZ, Renegade, Backcountry), REV Gen4 (MXZ Neo, Renegade, 
Backcountry, Summit, Freeride)
860202655
•	 Compatible with rubber shims and Lateral Footplates 
(860202656).
DRIVER FOOTREST 
REV Gen5 (Trail, Crossover), REV Gen4, MXZ Neo, MXZ, Renegade, 
Backcountry and Grand Touring
860201932 • Black
860201613 • White
860201614 • Manta Green
•	 Customize the fit and function of your sled. 
•	 Offers a natural angled platform for riders that push with 
their feet.
•	 Machined aluminum extrusions in different colors, add 
traction and style.
•	 Not compatible with Lateral Footplates (860202656).
90    ACCESSORIES    CATEGORY
90    ACCESSORIES    TOE-HOLDS, FOOTRESTS & KNEE PADS

136  APPAREL  HANDWEAR
STAMINA EXPEDITION GLOVES
669051 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
• Extra warm gloves for comfort 
in all riding conditions.
•  Use for trail and deep snow riding.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Top hand: 200 g PrimaLoft® Gold 
Palm: 133g PrimaLoft® Gold.
•  Waterproof, windproof and 
breathable glove insert.
•  Naturally moisture-wicking and 
antimicrobial wool blend lining.
•  Leather palm and ﬁngers with 
grip reinforcement.
•  Touch screen index ﬁnger.
•  Nose wipe on thumb.
Black (90), Fire Red (06)
NEW
LYNX QUANTUM LITE GLOVES
666041 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION:
Gloves for high-activity riding in warm 
conditions. Lightweight, windproof 
warmth, and ultimate breathability.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
- Genuine Goat leather palm with grip 
reinforcement. 
- Waterguard membrane.  
- Adjustable Velcro tab at wrist.  
- Reﬂective detailing.
Black (90)
STAMINA CLAW MITT
669052 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
• Extra warm claw mitts for comfort 
in all riding conditions.
•  Use for trail, crossover and adventure
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Waterproof, windproof and 
breathable glove insert.
•  Naturally moisture-wicking and 
antimicrobial wool blend lining.
•  Leather palm and ﬁngers with 
grip reinforcement.
•  Touch screen index ﬁnger.
•  Nose wipe on thumb.
Black (90), Fire Red (06)
NEW
LYNX ACTIVE GLOVES
660047 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION:
A lightweight glove without insulation 
for warm weather riding or for hand 
protection during short stops. Perfect 
also for oﬀ-season activities.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
-
Black with Graphics (94)
HANDWEAR
LYNX QUANTUM 2.0 GLOVES STX
666044 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL
DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
Light and warm gloves for Deep snow riding. 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
Sympatex insert with 100% waterproof, 
windproof and breathability. 
Full leather ﬁngers and palm for perfect ﬁt 
and feel. 
2 layer Shell fabric with Sympatex insert. 
Thinsulate (40g) insulation. 
Micro Active lining. 
Full leather ﬁngers. 
Powder Cuﬀ, Wristband, Stopper system. 
Pull and penetrate loop.
Black (90)
LYNX STAMINA 2.0 GLOVES
666045 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL
DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
Warm performance gloves for riding trail and 
oﬀ trail. These gloves with Sympatex insert 
and mid-weight insulation to keep you warm 
and dry in varying conditions. 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
Waterproof and breathable gloves with 
durable shell material. 
Warm Primaloft insulation. 
Pre-curved shape for optimal ﬁt. 
Long, adjustable gauntlet. 
Hanging loops.
Black (90)

64  ACCESSORIES  WIND PROTECTION & MIRRORS
ADJUSTABLE WINDSHIELD HIGH TO 
EXTRA HIGH
Radien / Radien-X
860201782
• Quickly change your level of wind protection with the flip of a lever.
• Compatible with Glove Box Extension (860201523).
• Adjustable range of 58.5 cm to 68.5 cm).
• Side deflectors (860201910) and windshield support (517306183) required for installation.
• Not compatible with handguards and muffs.
ADJUSTABLE WINDSHIELD MEDIUM TO 
HIGH
Radien / Radien-X
860201493
• Quickly change your level of wind protection with the flip of a lever.
• Compatible with Glove Box Extension.
• Adjustable range of 48.5 cm to 58.5 cm.
• Side deflectors (860201910) and windshield support (517306183) required for installation.
• Not compatible with handguards and muffs.
ADJUSTABLE WINDSHIELD LOW TO 
MEDIUM
Radien / Radien-X
860201820
• Quickly change your level of wind protection with the flip of a lever.
• Compatible with Glove Box Extension.
• Adjustable range of 35,6 cm to 43.2 cm.
• Windshield support (517305749) included.
• Not compatible with handguards and muffs.
WINDSHIELD, EXTRA HIGH
Radien / Radien-X
860202257
• 63,5 cm high. 
• Provides maximum wind protection.
• Includes side deflectors and windshield support kit. 
• Not compatible with handguards and muffs.

List all technical specifications with their values:

RAVE GLS  
40TH ANNIVERSARY EDITION
40 years of trail dominance: Retro meets Turbo in 
a legendary design inspired by the legendary GLS 
3300 model. Unleash power with the most advanced 
2-stroke turbo engine ever. 
BRUTAL RE  
EXTREME CROSSOVER SNOWMOBILE
With its turbo power and a monster track, 
the new Brutal RE can go places no other 
crossovers dare. 
ADVENTURE LIMITED  
TRAIL SNOWMOBILE
Irresistible comfort, top-notch performance and 
cutting-edge design for demanding trail adventurers. 
The newborn Adventure Limited takes the adventure 
to a new level.
ROTAX 850 E-TEC TURBO R ENGINE 
WITH WATER INJECTION
The most powerful factory-built snowmobile engine, 
available with Rave GLS 40th Anniversary Edition and 
Xterrain RE. Instant acceleration with ferocious, yet 
seamless power.
10.25” TOUCHSCREEN DISPLAY 
WITH BUILT-IN GPS
The 10,25 inch full color touchscreen display has 
enhanced features like built-in GPS with trail and 
topographic maps, allowing you to navigate without 
phone connection. Connect your phone with the BRP 
Go! app and unlock a world of new winter adventures 
with extended features.
XTERRAIN RE  
CROSSOVER SNOWMOBILE
For turbo-charged trail adventures. The Xterrain 
RE is the extreme trail crossover that thrills with its 
unparalled riding dynamics, boosted with Rotax® 
turbo power. Kilometer after kilometer. 
THE RACING LEGEND RETURNS
ELEVATE YOUR TRAIL TALES
UNLEASH THE TRAIL BEAST
UNLOCK NEW ADVENTURES
ALL TERRAIN ADVENTURER
THE POWER TO EXPLORE FURTHER
2025 WHAT’S NEW
SPRING 
ONLY

M-FORGE® Composite shell

HELMET (DOT)

•  Visor equipped with an adjustable 
ventilation system to adjust the 
temperature inside the helmet 
according to the weather conditions.

reduction up to 10°C compared 
to the visor without a vent.
•  Lightweight CARBON 
M-FORGE® Composite shell 
•  Large neck skirt with vent.
•  Rear removeable curtain
•  1750 g ± for size large. 
Black (90)
NEW
OXYGEN FLOW HELMET (DOT)
OXYGEN FLOW HELMET 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  Visor equipped with an adjustable 
ventilation system to adjust the 
temperature inside the helmet 
according to the weather conditions. 
Our tests have shown a temperature 
reduction up to 10°C compared 
to the visor without a vent.
•  Includes a rear removable 
curtain and a vent in the chin 
curtain for extra airﬂow
•  Lightweight M-FORGE® 
Composite shell 
•  Neck skirt to reduce air intrusion.
•  1850 g ± for size large. 
Black (90), Matte Black (93)
NEW
OXYGEN HELMET – COMMON FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  4-year limited warranty.
•  Adjustable humidity extractor vents.
•  Unobstructed panoramic ﬁeld 
of vision for an incredible mask-
less riding experience.
•  Sun visor heated chamber.
•  Ampliﬁed heated visor with 
pivot contact system.
•  Retractable amber sun visor.
•  Prescription eyeglasses friendly.
•  Durable anti-fog and anti-
scratch coatings.
•  NCS System: Reduces noise 
•  Robust detents allow precise 
opening adjustments for airﬂow.
•  Optional front LED utility light.
•  Lightweight battery-less rear LED 
light for added rider safety.
•  eLinQ rear magnet connector.
•  Offered with amber sun visor for 
best vision in snow conditions.
•  Ready to receive the 
communication system.
•  Operate all features with gloved hands.
•  2 shell sizes for better ﬁt and comfort.
•  Ratcheting quick-release chin strap.
•  Recyclable helmet shell for 
minimal environmental impact.
•  Aerodynamic shape to 
reduce neck fatigue.
•  D.O.T. certiﬁed

•	 Ice scratcher replaceable carbide tips.
RAIL ICE SCRATCHERS
Compatible with SC5M, SC5U (16” and 20”), rMotion and rMotion-X 
suspensions 
860202330
•	 Provides additional cooling in hard and icy conditions. 
•	 The spring configuration makes it possible to drive in 
reverse, reducing the risk of damage. 
•	 Small and compact, stored along the rail when not in use.
•	 For hook replacement use service part 860202574.
•	 An additional wheel is required on snowmobiles under 
certain conditions when installing the Rail Ice Scratchers. 
Please see instruction sheet.
LinQ LIGHTWEIGHT SNOWFLAP 
EXTENSION
REV Gen5, REV Gen4 (with short tunnel)
860202393
•	 Removable snowflap extension that helps engine cooling in 
hardpack, low and icy snow conditions when installed.
•	 Stows on the tunnel when not in use. 
•	 Installs on the stock lightweight snowflap of  
Summit and Freeride models with short tunnel.
•	 Compatible with stock and hitch bumpers. 
LinQ REMOVABLE SNOW FLAP 
REV Gen5 and REV Gen4 Freeride and Summit 154” and longer
REV Gen5 146” Backcountry, REV Gen4 146” Backcountry, Summit, 
Freeride: specific installation required, see instruction sheet for 
details
860201914
•	 Lets you play in the deep powder with no restriction.
•	 Retains cooling properties when installed.
•	 Stows on tunnel when not in use.
•	 Installs with stock snowflap.
•	 Does not fit with Hitch Rear Bumper.
•	 Does not fit short tunnel.

860200467 • Black / Grey

Neo) and Summit XM
REV Gen4 20” and 24”
860202267*

860202387
860202388

List all technical specifications with their values:

LYNX STAMINA ENDURO PANTS
651128 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
These crossover highpants with Sympatex 
fabrics and mid-weight insulation to keep 
you warm and dry whether you’re carving 
up trails, exploring the woods or in open 
space. Most comfortable insulated riding 
gear for most demanding rides. For Lynx 
customer who demands technical qualities 
and workable gear in many environments 
and conditions. Performance lightly 
insulated pants for riding on and oﬀ trail.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  100% waterproof, 100% windproof, 
optimally breathable Sympatex material.
•  All seams sealed
•  Cordura reinforcement fabric 
on high wear areas.
•  Primaloft Black Eco insulation 
Primaloft Black 100 grams
•  Sporty, articulated ﬁtting to give 
the optimal movement in riding
•  High front and lower back bib.
•  Stretch panels at sides and back
•  Adjustable suspenders, crossed at back.
•  One spacious cargo pocket with gusset
•  Preshaped and padded knees 
with removable knee pads
•  Flexible storm gaiters with snap 
system attachment to boots
•  Killer loop D-ring at waist
•  Bip pocket
•  Full-length water repellent YKK 
2-way zippers at front and sides
•  Reﬂective ﬁlm taping for visibility
PERFORMANCE

 WATERPROOFNESS 
BREATHABILITY 
WARMTH
KEY BENEFITS

ELEMENT PROOF 
MULTI USE 
HIGH AIRFLOW

List all technical specifications with their values:

153!!PROTECTIVE GEAR!!HELMETS
For safety reasons, the battery cannot be charged while riding. Considering the increased risks inherent when 
charging a battery, BRP has chosen NOT to make this action possible to guarantee maximum user safety.
Features may vary depending on the vehicle.
COMMUNICATION SYSTEM  
AND HELMET ACCESSORIES
Black (90)
ADVEX HELMET-INTEGRATED LED 
UTILITY LIGHT
929085 • One size
• Accessory for Advex helmet.
• Utility ﬂashlight.
• Tool-free installation.
• 3 power modes.
• 3 AAA batteries (battery box to install 
in the helmet, batteries not included).
• Using the Vibe Communication 
System Battery.
• Connection of the Vibe communication 
system by eLinQ (electric power 
supplied by the vehicle).
• Easy one-handed on/o! without a button 
(by opening/closing).
• High level of illumination, over 100 lumens.
• ECE 22.06 certiﬁcation for helmet.
Matte Black (93)
VIBE UNIVERSAL COMM SYSTEM 
BY BRP
929105 • One size
• VIBE UNIVERSAL Comm System with 
superior audio quality for every BRP helmet.
• Sound by harman/kardon®.
• Mesh 2.0: Robust Reliability compatible 
with all Sena Mesh devices.
• Largest battery capacity with 8 
hours talk time at -20°C/-4°F.
• One-Click-to-Connect simplicity.
• Mesh Intercom™ features 
superior audio quality.
• 1 antenna for 1 mile/1.6 km in open terrain.
• Multi-channel protocol in Open Mesh allows 
users to switch between 9 comm channels.
• Bluetooth® 5.1 enabled.
• Convenience of voice-activated digital 
assistant access (“Hey Google”/”Hey Siri”).
• 30% faster Rapid-Charging.
• Glove-friendly interface.
• Compatible with most BRP helmets.
• Compatible with numerous new BRP 
snowmobile handle bar controls to 
mute/unmute, volume up or down 
and information display such as the 
battery status and mesh channel.
Matte Black (93)
VIBE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM 
BY BRP
929086 • One size
• VIBE Bluetooth Mesh Comm System with 
superior audio quality for the Advex helmet.
• Premium Speakers & Microphone 
with SOUND BY Harman Kardon®.
• Mesh 2.0: Robust reliability compatible 
with all Sena Mesh devices.
• One-Click-to-Connect simplicity.
• Mesh Intercom™ features superior 
audio quality  compatible with 
all Sena Mesh devices.
• 2 antennas for 1 mile/1.6 km in open terrain.
• Multi-channel protocol in Open Mesh allows 
users to switch between 9 comm channels.
• Bluetooth® 5.1 enabled.
• Convenience of voice-activated digital 
assistant access (“Hey Google”/”Hey Siri”).
• Fast charging.
• Glove-friendly interface.
• Compatible with all Advex helmets.
• Never run out of power when installed 
in ADVEX Radiant helmet version 
and plugged in your Lynx.
• Largest battery capacity with 8 
hours talk time at -20°C/-4°F.
Black (90)
OXYGEN LED UTILITY LIGHT
929006 • One size
• Accessory for Oxygen helmet.
• Oxygen – Chin LEDBEAM Utility Light.
• 2 AAA batteries (batteries not included).

VIBE UNIVERSAL COMM SYSTEM 
BY BRP
929105 • One size
• VIBE UNIVERSAL Comm System with 
superior audio quality for every BRP helmet.
• Sound by harman/kardon®.
• Mesh 2.0: Robust Reliability compatible 
with all Sena Mesh devices.
• Largest battery capacity with 8 
hours talk time at -20°C/-4°F.
• One-Click-to-Connect simplicity.
• Mesh Intercom™ features 
superior audio quality.
• 1 antenna for 1 mile/1.6 km in open terrain.
• Multi-channel protocol in Open Mesh allows 
users to switch between 9 comm channels.
• Bluetooth® 5.1 enabled.
• Convenience of voice-activated digital 
assistant access (“Hey Google”/”Hey Siri”).
• 30% faster Rapid-Charging.
• Glove-friendly interface.
• Compatible with most BRP helmets.
• Compatible with numerous new BRP 
snowmobile handle bar controls to 
mute/unmute, volume up or down 
and information display such as the 
battery status and mesh channel.
Matte Black (93)

messages.content:
List all technical specifications with their values:

This is not a Coast Guard-approved personal flotation device; this is flotation  
assistance technology. Always make sure bodies of water are safe for 
riding and know that currents may affect ice thickness before adventuring.
EXIT ASSIST
Mesh drainage to ensure you 
are not weighed down by the 
water that can inhibit exit 
SELF LEVELING
Strategically placed ExoFloat 
panels help assist you in self 
leveling to the surface
FLOAT ASSIST
Allow garment to assist you to  
the surface and exit the water 
quickly and safely 
VASA  
COLLECTION

No need for flotation assist 
pants with the Vasa+, our 
most advanced flotation 
assist jacket.
DID YOU
KNOW?
Scan here  
for more info
®
SKI-DOO
Built into every Vasa model, our ExoFloat System helps 
riders hit the trail with peace of mind knowing that  
they’re still safe if they fall into a frozen body of water. 
Bridging the gap between comfort and science, this garment 
features an exoskeleton that is fully mapped out with 
high-tech flotation panels. Plus, it has mesh panels that 
evacuate the water. For optimal performance, make sure  
to wear the Vasa jacket and pants together, or go for the 
new Vasa+ jacket.
TECHNOLOGY  
WITH A SAFETY  
TWIST! 
- BREATHABLE
   Breathe easy for all-day comfort.
- COMFORT TECH 
   Custom fit thanks to the new perforated memory
   foam comfort flotation panel.
- ADVANCED MATERIAL 
   New Sympatex membranes create windproof apparel
   and waterproof that’s resistant to abrasion.
The expanded Vasa+ flotation assist collection  
is here to help seasoned and new riders alike 
drive worry-free and with peace of mind.
I'll extract engine displacement, horsepower, track width, track length, suspension travel, and other technical specifications.

1. Find your size.
2. The corresponding code is  
THE CODE you use to complete  
the part number on your order.  
Example: 440227__90  
Size: M = Code “06",  
therefore 4402270690
HEIGHT: Without shoes, standing with heels and back against a wall.
HEAD/HELMET: Around your head, from the center of the forehead, above the ears  
and over the natural bump at the back of the head.
ARM LENGTH: Let the hands hang down on the side in a slightly bent position. Measure  
from the center of the back of your neck, along the length of your arm, to the wrist.
CHEST/BUST: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. 
WAIST: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping one finger between the tape and body.
HIPS: Across the fullest part of the seat.
INSEAM: Without shoes, from crotch to the floor.
GLOVES: Measure palm width.
BOOTS: Foot length from heel to toe.
• For best results, have someone else take your measurements.
• Measure body in underwear.
• Tape must be snug but not tight.
• If measurements fall between two sizes, order the larger size.

W HAT  C O D E  R E PR ES E NTS  YO U R  S IZE? 
1. Find your size.
2. The corresponding code is  
THE CODE you use to complete  
the part number on your order.  
Example: 440227__90  
Size: M = Code “06",  
therefore 4402270690
HEIGHT: Without shoes, standing with heels and back against a wall.
HEAD/HELMET: Around your head, from the center of the forehead, above the ears  
and over the natural bump at the back of the head.
ARM LENGTH: Let the hands hang down on the side in a slightly bent position. Measure  
from the center of the back of your neck, along the length of your arm, to the wrist.
CHEST/BUST: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. 
WAIST: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping one finger between the tape and body.
HIPS: Across the fullest part of the seat.
INSEAM: Without shoes, from crotch to the floor.
GLOVES: Measure palm width.
BOOTS: Foot length from heel to toe.
• For best results, have someone else take your measurements.
• Measure body in underwear.
• Tape must be snug but not tight.
• If measurements fall between two sizes, order the larger size.

109  CATEGORY 2  SEGMENT
CROSSOVER
MAKE THE MOST OF YOUR WINTER!
The original Lynx Squadron riding gear oﬀers you the best functional performance for all your 
winter activities: warmth without bulk, tough fabrics, sealed seams and ventilation. With both 
practical and trendy options, the Squadron range has you covered for work, mountain riding and 
day-to-day living.
DEEP SNOW/CROSSOVER
SQUADRON 
INSULATED
• Lynx Squadron OPS is an 
insulated onepiece suit for 
men for multiuse with 80gr 
Primaloft Black insulation.
• Colorful Squadron Kids OPS 
is developed together with 
kids. Thermal loft insulation 
is a perfect choice for riding 
and playing in the snow.
SQUADRON 
FLEX
• Light and multifunctional shell 
jacket for deep snow riding 
and winter sports now with 
new Stretch Shell fabric.
• Partly insulated shell highpants 
for deep snow riders and 
winter activities now with 
new Stretch Shell fabric.
• Light and multifunctional shell 
one-piece suit for deep snow 
riding and winter sports now 
with new Stretch Shell fabric.

LinQ JERRY CAN 20 L
Radien² / Radien-X 500 mm  
Radien-X 600 mm
715007822
• Quick, easy and secure LinQ system installation.
• Spill-free spout for easy use.
• 20 liter capacity.
• Meets new Flame Mitigation Device (FMD) standard.
• Compatible with the Multi LinQ Plate for 20’’ and 24’’ tunnels.
• Not compatible with Luggage Rack Reinforcement Plates (860200798).
LinQ PRO LIGHT BAG - 26 L
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X
860202620 
860202747 • cover lid only
• Lightweight.
• Attaches with one set of LinQ fasteners.
• Suitable for positions 0, 1, 2 and above the LinQ Stackable Fuel Caddy.
• 26 liter capacity.
• Compatible with Cover Lids 860202747, 860202132 & 860202383.
• Pocket under the lid for quick and easy access.
• Brightly colored interior makes it easy to locate objects.
• Removable interior for easy cleaning.
• 3 removable dividers to organize cargo.
LinQ SPORT BAG 17 L
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X
860202447
• 17 liter capacity.
• Rigid bottom, semi-rigid top.
NEW
LinQ EXPANDABLE BAG - 17 L
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X
860202895
• Semi-rigid expandable 8.5 L to 17 L LinQ tunnel bag.
• Compression style bag allows secure storage of belongings.
• Premium look pairs well with the vehicle.
• Quick, easy and secure LinQ system installation.
• Attaches with one set of LinQ fasteners.
• Featuring inside mesh pocket to separate smaller items.

Brick Red (33)
FLANNEL SHIRT
454575* • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Warm and comfortable Flannel shirt. 
• 100% cotton.
• 4-hole plastic side engraved buttons. 
• Corduroy inside stand collar. 
• Ski-Doo suede patch on sleeve.
Charcoal Grey (07)
MEN’S SKI-DOO PIT SHIRT
454576 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Ski-Doo Pit shirt perfect to wear when working 
around your snowmobile. 
• 65% polyester, 32% cotton, 3% spandex.
• Chest pocket.
• Back pleats for ease of movement.
• Back loop to hang shirt.
• Ski-Doo logo on left chest.
• Sponsors logos on right chest.
Charcoal Grey (07), Denim Blue (79), Khaki (05)
MID-LAYER FLEECE
454577* • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Semi-fitted zipped sweatshirt.
• Use everyday and as a mid layer on trails.
• 100% polyester with anti-microbial.
• Heavy weight fleece for maximum warmth.
• Zipped pocket at arm.
• Ski-Doo embroidery logo at front chest.
• 2 zipped hand pockets.
Black (90), Charcoal Grey (07), Grey (09)
MEN’S SKI-DOO TECH POLO
454582 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Short sleeve tech polo.
• 95% polyester, 5% spandex.
• Quick-Dry and moisture-wicking.
• 4-hole plastic embossed button.
• Ski-Doo silver print logo at back.
• Ski-Doo label at chest.
Charcoal Grey (07), Denim Blue (79)
CLUB HOUSE SWEATER
454583* • S, M, L, XL, 2XL
• Heritage look sweater.
• 60% cotton, 40% acrylic.
• Half-zip.
• Ski-Doo suede patch on sleeve.
Black (90), Heather Grey (27)
MEN’S CLIFF T-SHIRT
454587* • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Casual T-Shirt for everyday wear.
• 100% cotton.
• Heather Grey (27): 90% cotton, 10% polyester.

*While supplies last.
TUNNEL BAG – 25 L
REV-XP, XR, XM, XS, XU 
860200826
•	 Uses our cleat and bag retaining system (Patent 
USD607,313).
•	 Innovative thermoformed tunnel bag, designed for a slick 
look and rigid structure.
•	 Chassis premarked for easier installation of bag on tunnel.
•	 25 liter (6.6 US gallon, 1,526 cu in) capacity.
CARGO BAG – 80 L
REV Gen5, REV Gen4, XM, XP, XU, Backcountry, Freeride, Renegade, 
Summit, Tundra, 137” and up
860200801
•	 Rugged all-purpose utility design. 
•	 Sealed PVC construction.
•	 80 liter (21 US gallon, 4,882 cu in) capacity.
•	 Integrated attachment system.
•	 Includes rain cover for added resistance to the elements.
•	 Can also double as travel/duffle bag.
LinQ MODULAR CARGO BOX – 10 L
REV Gen5 (except MXZ Neo), REV Gen4 (except MXZ Neo)
715005494
•	 10 liter (2.6 gallons) of hard-sided modular storage 
capacity. 
•	 Heavy-duty construction with weather-resistant sealed lid. 
•	 Stackable with single LinQ bag or additional modular boxes 
for the ideal storage solution.
•	 Dimensions: 19” L x 12 1/2” W x 5” H.
MODULAR TUNNEL BAG EXTENSION 
– 38 L
REV-XR and Grand Touring, REV-XS Grand Touring
860200173*
•	 Versatile multi-configuration bag.
•	 Use alone, with or without Fuel Caddy, or with Semi-Rigid 
Tunnel Bag (860200174).
•	 Installs horizontally or vertically and removes easily.
•	 38 liter (10 US gallon, 2,319 cu in) capacity.
EXTRA LARGE XU BAG – 150 L
REV-XU Skandic, XU Expedition
860201179*
•	 Extra large 150 liter (40 US gallon, 9,154 cu in) capacity bag 
shaped to fit utility model racks. 
•	 Weather-resistant polyester, includes compartment 
organizer.
TUNNEL BAG – 40 L
REV-XP, XR, XS, XM, XU Tundra
860200824
•	 Includes a compartment for the Ski‑Doo Shovel 
(860201919) (not included).
•	 Chassis premarked for easier installation of bag on tunnel.
•	 40 liter (10.6 US gallon, 2,441 cu in) capacity.
•	 Extension provides more cargo space when required.
LinQ THERMAL BOX – 16 L
REV Gen5 (except MXZ Neo), REV Gen4  (except MXZ Neo), XM, XS, XP, XU 
(except Grand Touring)
219400964
•	 Rotomolded design with 16 liter  
(4.2 US gallon, 976 cu in) capacity.
•	 High-quality foam insulation for optimal performance  
hot or cold.
•	 Does not fit with 1+1 backrest.
•	 Can contain twenty 355 ml cans.
•	 Exterior dimensions: 13” L x 20” W x 10” H.
•	 Interior dimensions: 9” L x 17” W x 7” H.
52    ACCESSORIES    STORAGE

CVT MAINTENANCE PARTS
PERFORMANCE DRIVE BELTS
• High performance drive belts calibrated to maximize your sled’s performance.
• Aramid tensile cords used in construction for extra long life and dependability,  
also delivers a consistent length with minimal belt shrinkage and minimal length adjustments.
• High tensile reinforced fiber elastomer undercords provide minimal dusting and long term flex life.
• Flexweave overcord for superior adhesion and crack resistance.
• Consistent performance during life of belt.
• Quality you can count on for optimum performance.
• Built with distinctive durability features for mountain, trail or fast tracks.

List all technical specifications with their values:

120  APPAREL  RACING
RACING
Your blood pumping through the veins. 
Your heart pounding with excitement. The 
unbreakable concentration from start to 
ﬁnish. Your eye ﬁrmly on the prize: crossing 
the line and earning your place on the 
podium. It’s the winning spirit you take from 
the track to your team – and the right riding 
gear that gives you the edge.
Carry your team colors proudly! Snowmobile 
racing is more than just a passion: it requires 
tenacity, commitment, and adequate apparel. 
The Lynx Racing clothing, made out of 
high-quality materials, provides you with 
functional moisture management, warmth and 
protection every time you hit the track. Add 
a ﬁnal touch to your winning look, even in the 
days between races.
RIDE WITH YOUR TRIBE. 
AHEAD OF THE PACK.
TRAIL

FUEL & OIL CADDIES
*While supplies last.
LinQ FUEL CADDY – 3.78 L
REV Gen5, REV Gen4, XS, XM, XR, XP, XU
860201774*
•	 1 US gallon (3.78 liter) capacity.
•	 Smaller size for less weight. 
•	 Can be used in position 1 or 2 and on top of LinQ Fuel 
Caddy – 14.5 L.
•	 Easy-pour design for sleds or power tools.
•	 Doesn’t fit Grand Touring REV-XS.
LinQ OIL CADDY – 3.78 L
REV Gen5, REV Gen4, XS, XM, XR, XP, XU
860202445
•	 1 US gallon (3.78 liter) capacity.
•	 Can be used in position 1 or 2.
•	 Can be used on top of LinQ Stackable Fuel Caddy.
•	 Doesn’t fit Grand Touring REV-XS.
LinQ STACKABLE FUEL CADDY –  
14.5 L
REV Gen5, REV Gen4, XU, XS, XM, XR
860202246
•	 Quick, easy and secure installation with LinQ system. 
•	 No-spill spout for easy use.
•	 3.7 US gallon (14.5 liter) capacity.
•	 Single LinQ tunnel bag or LinQ oil caddy stacks on top for 
more storage by adding an extra set of LinQ Cargo Base Kit 
(860201806).
•	 Meets the new latest Flame Mitigation Device (FMD) 
standard. 
•	 Cannot be used with Luggage Rack Reinforcement Plates 
(860200798).
•	 Dimensions: 13” L x 19” W x 9” H.
LinQ FUEL CADDY – 11 L
REV Gen5, REV Gen4, XS, XM, XR, XP, XU
860202247
•	 Quick, easy and secure installation with LinQ system.
•	 No-spill spout for easy use.
•	 3 US gallon (11 liter) capacity.
•	 Meets the new latest Flame Mitigation Device (FMD) 
standard.
•	 Doesn’t fit Grand Touring REV-XS.
•	 Cannot be used with Luggage Rack Reinforcement Plates 
(860200798).
LinQ FUEL CADDY – 20 L
Fits all 20” and 24” tunnels
715007822
•	 Quick, easy and secure LinQ system installation.
•	 Spill-free spout for easy use.
•	 5 US gallon (20 liter) capacity.
•	 Meets new Flame Mitigation Device (FMD) standard.
•	 Compatible with the Multi LinQ Plate for 20” and 24” 
tunnels.
•	 Not compatible with Ski‑Doo 16” tunnels.
•	 Not compatible with Luggage Rack Reinforcement Plates 
(860200798).
•	 Dimensions: 12” L x 19” W x 12” H.

•  Warmly insulated jacket for Trail,

FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• 100% seams and logos sealed.
•  Radiant Core technology to keep warm
•  Waterproof, breathable and windproof
•  170g of PrimaLoft ® Black insulation 
(200g insulation on removable collar)
•  Additionnal removable collar 
to seal air entry.
•  2 hand pockets, 1 napoleon pocket with

and wind protection.

messages.content:
List all technical specifications with their values:

K YB SHOCKS
SUSPENSION
FOX SHOCK KITS
KYB PERFORMANCE SHOCKS KIT
REV Gen5 and REV Gen4 with RAS X suspension (except SAS) 
860202466
• Race Edition KYB shock absorbers. 
• Piggy Back 46 mm bodies with 16 mm shaft. 
• Feature separate adjustments for high- and low-speed 
compression plus rebound damping. 
• Kashima coated for friction-free performance and long life.
• Fits RAS X front suspension.
SHOCK UPGRADE KIT
Neo Base
860202210
• Premium front shock upgrade for base Neo model.
• KYB 36mm high pressure gas shock absorber.
• Spring preload adjustment.
• Reverse mounting (body up) to minimize unsprung weight.
REAR TRACK SHOCKS – 
LIGHTWEIGHT FLOAT 3 QS3 
(CENTER) / 1.5 ZERO QSR WITH 
LOCK-OUT (REAR)
REV Gen4 Summit and Freeride 146”, 154”, 165” with tMotion 
860202278*
• This FOX kit features the Lightweight Float 3 center  
and 1.5 Zero with lock-out rear shocks to help your  
sled get skinny. The center shock features QS3 three 
position adjustment for quick and easy compression and 
rebound adjustments. The rear features QS3 compression 
adjustment plus a lockout feature.
• FEATURES: 
 – Optimized lightweight shock design.
 – One piece, aluminum mounting hardware.
 – High-flow velocity-sensitive damping.
 – Internal groove position sensitive technology.
 – Fully rebuildable and re-tunable.
 – Fits 146”-165” track lengths.
FRONT SHOCKS – LIGHTWEIGHT 1.5 
ZERO QS3-R
REV Gen4 (Summit and Freeride, except Summit Expert and Summit Neo)
860202275*
• The newest version of FOX’s renowned lightweight  
shocks and springs to fit deep snow sleds.  
They feature QS3 three position adjustment for quick and  
easy compression and rebound adjustments and  
fit S-36 front suspensions. 
• FEATURES: 
 – Optimized lightweight spring and shock design.
 – FOX ice scraper technology (FIST).
 – One piece, aluminum mounting hardware.
 – High-flow velocity-sensitive damping.
 – Internal groove position sensitive technology.
 – Fully rebuildable and re-tunable.
 – Ski stance: 34” and 36”.
REAR TRACK SHOCKS – 
LIGHTWEIGHT 1.5 ZERO QS3-R 
(CENTER) / LIGHTWEIGHT 1.5 ZERO 
QSR WITH LOCKOUT (REAR)
REV Gen4 Summit and Freeride 146”, 154”, 165” with tMotion 
860202276*
• The newest version of FOX’s renowned lightweight  
shocks to fit deep snow rear suspensions. 
The center shock features QS3 three position  
adjustment for quick and easy compression and rebound 
adjustments. The rear features QS3 compression 
adjustment plus a lockout feature.
• FEATURES: 
 – Optimized lightweight spring and shock design.
 – FOX ice scraper technology (FIST).
 – One piece, aluminum mounting hardware.
 – High-flow velocity-sensitive damping.
 – Internal groove position sensitive technology.
 – Fully rebuildable and re-tunable.
 – Fits 146”–165” track lengths. 
*While supplies last.
REAR SUSPENSION COIL
Neo
860202457
• Higher capacity springs for use with passengers or larger 
riders.
90
86  ACCESSORIES  CATEGORY

Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2025 specification page:

FRONT STOR AGE
*While supplies last.
DASHBOARD BAG – 2 L
REV-XP
860201176
•	 Easy-access bag designed to provide extra storage.
•	 2 liter (0.5 US gallon, 116 cu in) capacity.
HANDLEBAR BAG – 2 L
REV Gen5 (Trail, Crossover), REV Gen4 without mountain strap (except Neo)
860201565*
•	 2.3 liter (0.6 US gallon, 122 cu in) capacity.
•	 Semi-rigid construction.
•	 Mounted sturdily with clamp setup.
•	 Can be removed easily with vehicle’s tool.
•	 Inside soft liner.
•	 Water-resistant.
•	 Thermoformed hard plastic base. 
•	 Features a pocket to separate items.
GLOVEBOX LINER 
REV Gen4
860201270
•	 Thermoformed liner has a soft finish interior.
•	 Features one pocket to separate items.
10.25 IN. COLOR TOUCHSCREEN 
DISPLAY PROTECTOR 
Vehicle equipped with 10.25 in. Color Touchscreen Display
860202680
•	 Provides additional protection for the digital display 
10.25 in. touchscreen.
•	 Protects from scratches caused by ice, rocks, branches 
or other small debris.
•	 Anti-glare treatment to ensure good visibility.
•	 Includes cleaning tools: wet wipe, dry wipe, dust absorber 
and soft cloth.
GOGGLE DRYING BAG
REV Gen4 (Narrow)
860201691
•	 Designed specifically for a spare set of goggles.
•	 Under hood heat clears and dries wet fogged goggles.
•	 Protects goggles during the ride.
RISER BLOCK BAG 
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow), REV Gen4 with 165 mm riser and longer, REV-XM, 
XP, XR, XU Tundra
860201550 • Short

•	 Innovative 2-pocket carry bag for secure storage around 
the steering riser block.
•	 3W heated insulated pocket design reduces the chance 
of water bottles freezing and increases the battery life of 
small electronic equipment.
•	 Includes RCA adaptor kit.
•	 Requires Heated Visor Kit (860201234) for REV-XU, XM, 
XS, XP, XR, (860201283) for REV Gen4 and (860202338) for 
REV Gen5, sold separately.
OIL SUPPORT CADDY/GOGGLE BAG 
REV-XM, XS
860200614
•	 Multi-purpose bag.
•	 Allows you to easily access and carry an extra liter of XPS 
oil or a spare set of goggles.
•	 Installs conveniently on top of the CVT cooling system.
•	 Models without E-TEC engine need the Acoustic Plate 
(512060847).
52    ACCESSORIES    CATEGORY

DISPLAY PROTECTOR 
Vehicle equipped with 10.25 in. Color Touchscreen Display
860202680
•	 Provides additional protection for the digital display 
10.25 in. touchscreen.

or other small debris.
•	 Anti-glare treatment to ensure good visibility.

and soft cloth.
GOGGLE DRYING BAG
REV Gen4 (Narrow)
860201691
•	 Designed specifically for a spare set of goggles.
•	 Under hood heat clears and dries wet fogged goggles.
•	 Protects goggles during the ride.
RISER BLOCK BAG 
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow), REV Gen4 with 165 mm riser and longer, REV-XM, 
XP, XR, XU Tundra
860201550 • Short

•	 Innovative 2-pocket carry bag for secure storage around 
the steering riser block.
•	 3W heated insulated pocket design reduces the chance 
of water bottles freezing and increases the battery life of 
small electronic equipment.
•	 Includes RCA adaptor kit.
•	 Requires Heated Visor Kit (860201234) for REV-XU, XM, 
XS, XP, XR, (860201283) for REV Gen4 and (860202338) for 
REV Gen5, sold separately.
OIL SUPPORT CADDY/GOGGLE BAG 
REV-XM, XS
860200614
•	 Multi-purpose bag.
•	 Allows you to easily access and carry an extra liter of XPS 
oil or a spare set of goggles.
•	 Installs conveniently on top of the CVT cooling system.
•	 Models without E-TEC engine need the Acoustic Plate 
(512060847).

messages.content:
List all technical specifications with their values:

96  SYMPATEX
SYMPATEX KEY 
TECHNOLOGIES
PERFORMANCE
Re>Think Performance - Dynamic 
Breathability 
ln contrast to other membrane technologies,  
the poreless compact Sympatex membrane is 
based on a physical and chemical principle.  
The water-attracting (hydrophilic) part of the 
membrane absorbs the moisture from the 
body and emits it to the outside by 
evaporation. The water vapour molecules are 
transported outwards along the hydrophilic 
molecular chains. The molecular structure 
(hydrophilic components) of the Sympatex 
membrane swells in moisture and therefore 
provides space for water vapour transport 
and fast evaporation.

101  CATEGORY 2  SEGMENT
DEEP SNOW
MOUNTAIN/DEEP SNOW
QUANTUM PRO
• Lightweight 3-ply jackets, 
highpants and one-piece 
suits for deep snow riders.
• 100% waterproof, 100% 
windproof, optimally breathable 
Sympatex material
• Ultra durable Cordura 
reinforcement fabric on 
high wear areas
• Articulated sleeves and knees to 
ensure freedom of movement 
in every riding position
• No mesh liner
• Water repellent YKK zippers
• Reﬂectives for safe visibility
• D-Rings
QUANTUM
• Lightweight shell jacket is 
specially designed for active 
riding in deep snow.
•  100% waterproof & windproof, 
optimally breathable 
Sympatex material
•  Cordura reinforcement 
fabric on high wear areas
•  Two-way water repellent 
YKK zippers on front
CONQUER THE DEEP SNOW WITH NON-COMPROMISE TECHNICAL GEAR
The original Lynx Quantum riding gear offers you the best lightweight performance for 
mountain and deep snow riding. High-end shell clothing with Cordura fabrics and Sympatex 
membrane has been developed to meet every freerider’s demands.

DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
•  Warmly insulated jacket for Trail, 
Crossover, Adventure & Utility segments.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• 100% seams and logos sealed.
•  Radiant Core technology to keep warm
•  Waterproof, breathable and windproof
•  170g of PrimaLoft ® Black insulation 
(200g insulation on removable collar)
•  Additionnal removable collar 
to seal air entry.
•  2 hand pockets, 1 napoleon pocket with 
goggle cloth and 1 inner mesh pocket.
•  Reﬂective details for maximum visibility
•  Polar ﬂeece at front body and 
top arms for added warmth.
•  Top center front ﬂap and underﬂap insulated 
for heat retention and wind protection.
•  eLinQ system for wire cable.
•  Powder skirt.
•  Underarm vent
•  Articulated sleeves.
•  Adjustable cuﬀs with thumb hole gaiter.
•  YKK zippers throughout and YKK 
AquaGuard at hand pockets and chest 
pocket

  Hi-Vis coloration optimal for

•  Integrated ExoFloat System for ﬂotation 
assistance in the event of ice breakthrough.
•  Ideal for active Crossover riding.

with lifetime warranty.

accent on shoulders for optimal visibility.
•  Accessible whistle pocket for safety.

Radien-X Commander
860202778
• Fits 2 snowboards or 1 pair of skis and poles, all sizes.
• Redesigned: simpler, quicker and easier way to attach skis or snowboards even with gloves on.
• Easy to adjust from skis to boards in seconds.
• Rubber cushions protect the edges and hold ski poles securely without damage.
• Requires a rear rack.

Radien-X 500 mm

860201846

860202071

List all technical specifications with their values:

95  APPAREL  STAMINA
Our proprietary ExoFloat System features an exoskeleton 
that is fully body mapped with hi-tech ﬂotation panels that 
help assist you in case of a fall. It also has mesh panels at 
the bottom to evacuate water. For optimal performance, 
wear the Stamina Float jacket and Stamina pants together.
EXIT ASSIST
Mesh drainage to 
ensure you are not 
weighed down 
by the water that 
can inhibit exit 
SELF LEVELING
Strategically placed 
Exoﬂoat panels help 
assist you in self 
leveling to the surface
FLOAT ASSIST
For more than 30 
minutes (*rider 
must exit within this 
timeframe to avoid 
hypothermia) 
KEY TECHNOLOGIES
This is not a coast guard approved personal ﬂotation device, 
this is a ﬂotation assistance technology. We do not recommend 
riders to drive over unsafe frozen bodies of water.

and 24” (except Skandic Sport and Expedition Xtreme)
860201828

installed.

(860201795).

•	 Not compatible with Stackable LinQ Deck (860202746).
LinQ ICE AUGER HOLDER 
REV Gen5 20” and 24” (except Expedition Xtreme), REV Gen4 (Wide) 20” 
and 24” (except Skandic Sport and Expedition Xtreme)
860201828
•	 Securely mounts to right side of vehicle. 
•	 Easy on/off and installation.
•	 Retains full function of LinQ accessories.
•	 Handles augers with up to 10” blades.
•	 Works even when the Stackable LinQ Deck (860202746) is 
installed.
•	 May be installed with Heavy-Duty Hitch Rear Bumper 
(860201795).
•	 Does not fit with the LinQ Utility Premium Cargo Box 
(860202802) and the Low Profile Cargo Box (860202897).

REV Gen5 20” and 24” (except Expedition Xtreme) 
REV Gen4 (Wide) 20” and 24” (except Skandic Sport and Expedition 
Xtreme)
860201829
•	 Quick, easy and secure LinQ system installation.
•	 Premium look.
•	 Securely mounts to either side of the vehicle.
•	 Retains full function of LinQ accessories.
•	 Required for Gun Boot use on vehicle.
•	 Works with Gun Boot 6.0 impact* by Kolpin* (715001419).

(860201795).

REV Gen5, REV Gen4, XS, XM
860201846
•	 Designed for universal applications.

stored in multiple positions.
•	 Designed specifically for winter use.
•	 Sold in pairs.
•	 Can be installed on the Stackable LinQ Deck (860202746).
SKI‑DOO PULLING STRAP 
860202195
•	 Save your back and get unstuck the easy way.
•	 Lightweight, compact, affordable.
•	 Extremely robust material.
•	 Available in yellow only. 2 per pack.
SAW & HANDLE REPLACEMENT FOR SHOVEL
520002004
•	 D-shaped handle.
SHOVEL WITH SAW HANDLE
860201919

FOOTWEAR
TEC+ REC BOOTS
444240 • 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13
DESCRIPTION:
• Tec + Rec Boots with Tough abrasion resistant leather outer.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Tough abrasion resistant leather outer.
•  Breathable waterproof membrane.
•  Limit of comfort temperature range: -40°F 
to -58°F or -40°C to -50°C*.
•  Rugged ultra-grip outsole design.
•  Removable/inner liner.
Black (90)
LADIES’ TEC+ REC BOOTS
444241 • 6, 7, 8, 9, 10
DESCRIPTION:
• Ladies’ Tec + Rec boots with Tough abrasion resistant leather outer.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  Tough abrasion resistant leather outer and textile.
•  Sympatex breathable waterproof membrane.
•  Performance liner that will provide warmth and 
added comfort by shaping to your foot.
•  Limit of comfort temperature range: -58°F 
to -76°F or -50°C to -60°C.
•  Rugged ultra-grip outsole design.
•  Removable/inner liner.
Black (90)
TEC+ BOOTS
444253 • 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13
DESCRIPTION:
• Tec + Boots with moisture-wicking inner liner material.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Improved comfort and ﬂex 
•  Removable insole.
•  Unisex, smaller sizes added for ladies.
•  Kevlar reinforced laces.
•  600 g PrimaLoft ECO FOOTWEAR insulation for maximum comfort.
•  Leather outer layer incorporates HydroGuard† 
waterproof membrane.
•  Tapered rear shape for better achilles and ankle support.
•  Abrasion and impact resistant ice breaker toe piece.
•  Aggressive, durable anti-slip outsole for running board traction.
Black (90)

CROSSOVER/TRAIL
CROSSOVER/TRAIL
STAMINA ARCTIC
• The multifunctional hero for 
trail, adventure and utility
• The warmest trail outerwear in 
our collection with modern 3 in 1 
Utility Parka jacket and highpants.
STAMINA FLOAT
• Integrated ExoFloat System 
for ﬂotation assistance in the 
event of ice breakthrough.
• Ideal for active Crossover riding.
• Self-ﬂoating style. Does not require 
pants with ExoFloat System.
STAMINA ENDURO
This crossover suit with Sympatex 
fabrics keep you warm and dry 
whether you’re carving up trails, 
exploring the woods or in open 
space. Most comfortable insulated 
riding gear for most demanding 
rides. For Lynx customer who 
demand technical qualities 
and workable gear in many 
environments and conditions.
Experience the most comfortable insulated riding gear for most demanding rides. The original 
Lynx Stamina provides ultimate protection and ultra high performance for even the harshest 
riding conditions. With Sympatex fabrics and mid-weight insulation it will keep you warm and 
dry whether you’re carving up trails or exploring the woods.

147!!APPAREL!!ACTIVE
ACTIVE
LYNX ACTIVE PANTS
651136 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
Lynx Active pants for all-purpose use, for example cycling, hiking 
and trail running. These performance pants provide comfort when 
pedalling with light weight stretch fabric and many technical 
features. Pants for ultimate comfort when riding downhill and trail.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Dirt and water-repellent, breathable 
•  Strech softshell fabric with elastic panels
•  Pre-shaped ﬁt for optimal ride comfort and use with knee pads
•  Tapered ﬁtting
•  Hand pockets with zippers
•  Zipped security pocket on leg
•  Full lenght side zippers to be used for ventilation also
•  Lynx logo details
Black (90), Grey (09)
LYNX ACTIVE JACKET
650148 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
• Lynx Active jacket is lightweight, waterproopf and breathable jacket 
for all-purpose use, for example cycling, hiking and trail running.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Long-lasting weather protection
•  Waterproof & breathable
•  Cycling speciﬁc ﬁt
•  Back and underarm ventilation with mesh inserts
•  Hand pocket for easy access (jacket can be packed into pocket)
•  Reﬂective prints for visibility
Black (90), Grey (09)
LYNX ACTIVE CAP
665287 • Onesize
DESCRIPTION:
Light weight cap for o!-season activities.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• 97% polyester 3% elastane
Black (90),  
Grey (09)
The original Lynx Active range sees you through 
o!-season, dialing up the technical details that 
keep your engine running all year round. You will 
stay comfortable and protected from the top of 
the mountain down to the trails and in di!erent 
activities. Keeps you dry and prevents overheating. 
With this lightweight, breathable and waterproof 
outerwear, you are ready to go!

106  APPAREL  SQUADRON
SQUADRON
INSULATED
LYNX SQUADRON OPS (INS.)
Teal (74), Whiskey (28) 
Army Green (77)
650165, 650140 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
Insulated onepiece suit for  
men for multiuse.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  Insulated onepiece with 80gr
•  Primaloft Black insulation
•  RPM Max Shell
•  All seams sealed
•  Reinforcement fabric 
on high wear areas
•  Two-way front zipper
•  Waterproof YKK zippers
•  Front ventilations on armpit 
with zipper and mesh
•  Inner adjustable system on waist 
and removable suspenders 
inside
•  Lynx Cypher used in Graphics
PERFORMANCE

 WATERPROOFNESS 
BREATHABILITY 
WARMTH
KEY BENEFITS

ELEMENT PROOF 
GREAT VALUE 
MULTI USE
SQUADRON KIDS OPS (INS.)
Blue (80), Orange (12)
657008 • 4, 6, 8, 10
DESCRIPTION:
Colorful Squadron Kids OPS is developed together with 
kids. Thermal loft insulation is a perfect choice 
for riding and playing in the snow.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  Lynx Cypher used in Graphics
•  Thermal loft insulation
•  RPM Max Shell for 
moisture management
•  All seams sealed
•  Front closure and pockets 
with waterproof YKK zippers
•  Adjustable waist
KEY BENEFITS

ELEMENT PROOF 
DESIGNED FOR WINTER PLAYS 
MULTI USE

Extract all snowmobile model information from this LYNX 2025 specification page:

110  APPAREL  TEC LAYER
TEC LAYER
LYNX TECLAYER ALPHA DOWN JACKET
Black (90), Navy (89)
659154 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION:
•  Introducing the new ultra warm Lynx Tec Layer 
Heavyweight Down Packable Jacket.
•  Functional, warm outer layer for breaks while 
snowmobiling and regular winter use.
•  Can also be used as a very warm mid-layer on long, subzero journeys.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  Insulation: Primaloft® 
down blend Gold.
•  Packable design is great for 
on-the-go and travel!
•  Drawcord hem adjustment 
in pockets.
•  Microﬂeece and Spandex 
at underarm vents.
•  Down-blend insulation 
with high compression.
•  Sold with a stowable bag.
•  Ultralight water-repellent fabric.
•  Preshaped sleeves and elbows.
•  Fixed adjustable hood 
with laminated brim and 
ﬂexible polymer peak.
•  Elastic at cuffs.
•  YKK® 2-way Vislon® zipper 
at front opening
•  Inverted YKK® 1-way 
zippers at pockets.
•  2 spacious hand pockets at front.
•  Chest pocket with 2 spacious 
inner lining pockets.
•  Adjustable hem with elastic 
and toggle on both sides.
PERFORMANCE

 WATERPROOFNESS 
BREATHABILITY 
WARMTH
KEY BENEFITS

 REGULATE WARMTH

HANDLEBAR ACCESSORIES
HANDGUARDS
HANDLEBAR MUFFS
REV Gen5, REV Gen4 (except Grand Touring 2016 and up)
860202812
•	 Ultra-warm muffs with faux-fur liner for extreme cold 
conditions. 
•	 Thermoformed construction allows muffs to keep their 
shape and provides more space for hand movement. 
•	 Easy to install and remove with gloves on.
•	 Large transparent section allows visibility of control 
switches. 
Note: Never use handlebar muffs with finger throttle lever.
PERFORMANCE SMALL DIAMETER 
HANDLEBAR
REV Gen5, REV Gen4
860202722 • Black
860201974 • Silver
•	 Narrow design used for more agile precise maneuvers 
found in mountain applications or in trail applications, ideal 
for smaller hand grip.
•	 Smaller diameter provides a lighter, easier grip.
•	 20 mm (0.79 in) grip, 22 mm (0.87 in) clamper diameter at 
riser.
•	 Less hand fatigue.
•	 Heater elements and grips included and installed.
BRAKE RESERVOIR GUARD
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow), REV Gen4 Summit and Freeride
860202171
•	 Increases impact protection for the brake reservoir.
•	 Window to see fluid level.
•	 Cast aluminum construction.
•	 Detailed technical finish.
EASY THROTTLE
REV Gen5, REV Gen4 (except 600 ACE, 900 ACE and 900 ACE Turbo) 
(except Neo)
860202719
•	 Less hand fatigue.
•	 Throttle closer to the bars allowing a better grip on the 
handlebar.
•	 20% reduction in pressure to use.
•	 Included on Neo+.

standard lever.

DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
•  Stamina Arctic, the multifunctional hero 
jacket for trail, adventure and utility
•  The warmest trail outerwear in our collection 
with modern 3 in 1 Utility Parka jacket
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• 100% windproof, waterproof and highly breathable membrane.
•  170g of PrimaLoft® Gold insulation with a removable 
lining jacket with 60g of PrimaLoft® Gold.
•  Lining jacket can be worn as its own and as additional warmth.
•  2 ply Sympatex membrane technology with lifetime warranty.
•  100% seams and logos sealed.
•  Waterproof YKK zippers
•  Removable hood.
•  Center front ﬂap for wind protection.
•  Fleece inside collar and softhell collar edge
•  Preshaped sleeves and elbows
•  E-LinQ system for wire cable.
•  Underarm vents.
•  2 Large Chest pockets to carry extra cargo
•  2 spacious hand pockets at front, 1 sleeve pocket 
- in the chest pocket a microﬁber cloth to wipe goggles
•  Cell phone pocket and beanie mesh pocket inside
•  D-ring killer loop at hem right side, adjustable 
hem with elastic and toggle on both side
•  Reﬂective taping at sleeves and back yoke.
•  Lynx-logo embroideries at chest pocket, sleeve and hood
•  Adjustable cuffs with thumb hole gaiter
•  Snow gaiter on waist

messages.content:
Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2024 specification page:

**Does not fit REV Gen4. ***Fits only REV Gen4. **** Second carbide can be added to ski by drilling marked additional holes.
Note: The use of aggressive skis, ski carbide runners or studs will alter the handling of your snowmobile, particularly in terms of maneuverability, acceleration and braking.  
Please refer to your Operators Guide for more details.
/  
/
S KI S
PL ATFORMS: REV GEN4 / XP / XR / XU / XS / XM / REV
TOURING
PILOT 5.7 SL 
2 carbides/ski
• Lightweight single or dual runner skis provide effortless steering at low speeds and 
constant grip without compromise at higher speeds.
• Standard use is one carbide runner—add a second to reduce darting.
• Great all-around trail performance.
UTILITY
PILOT 7.4
1 carbide/ski
• Specifically designed for utility purposes.
• Deeper keels allow more control while towing.
• Increased tip-up rear end for better reverse capability.
• 1 inch wider than Pilot DS-2 for improved flotation in deep snow.
• More aggressive cornering while keeping a light steering feeling.
TRAIL SPORT
PILOT 5.7 
1 or 2  
carbides/ski****
• Lightweight single or dual runner skis provide effortless steering at low speeds and 
constant grip without compromise at higher speeds.
• Standard use is one carbide runner—add a second to reduce darting.
• Great all-around trail performance.
PILOT TS 
ADJUSTABLE
1 carbide/ski
• The industry’s first and only adjustable ski.
• The Pilot TS skis allow riders to change ski bite for changing snow conditions or  
riding styles easily and quickly.
• With the Pilot TS skis you dial in the perfect setting by turning a knob on the ski leg.
• The ski runner has 1⁄2” (12.5 mm) of travel up and down.
• The thin runner and square keel design work together to eliminate darting.
PILOT X
1 carbide/ski
• Completely redesigned from Pilot 5.7 with a new structural topside for 10% more 
rigidity. 
• 31 mm longer keel with a new shape reduces darting.
• Adds 10% more lateral surface area and blends more smoothly with a new carbide.
• 11° degree reduction in approach angle.
PILOT TX
1 carbide/ski
• Improved to better match the REV Gen4 features.
• Redesigned top side for increased rigidity.
• 20 mm shorter overall length and more dramatic tip-up at the rear.
• 63 mm longer runner plate increases lateral surface for more effective cornering.
• Smoother front approach angle to reduce darting even further.
TRAIL 
PERFORMANCE
PILOT R 
1 carbide/ski
• Straight from the MXZ X 600RS race sled.
• Very aggressive profile for sharp handling.
• Lightweight with high rigidity.
• Proven on the ISOC race circuit.
DEEP SNOW
PILOT DS** 
1 carbide/ski
• Designed specifically for deep snow riding.
• Works well in many off-trail applications from utility sleds to mountain sleds.
• Thin edge is effective for grabbing side hills.
PILOT DS-2
1 carbide/ski
• Evolution of the DS with a deeper and shorter keel.
• Increased agility and less effort than the original.
• Great all-around ski for deep snow use.
• Standard on mountain sleds with 2.5” lug tracks and utility sleds.
PILOT DS-3**
1 carbide/ski
• Deep snow ski designed to match the latest 3” lug and longer tracks.
• 0.47” (12 mm) deeper keel than DS-2.
• Works well for aggressive riders using the biggest tracks.
PILOT DS-3  
REV Gen4***
1 carbide/ski
PILOT DS-4
1 carbide/ski
• 2-stage keel design improves flotation. 
• Entire keel has been moved forward with a revised rear portion for improved 
consistency in deep snow and straighter tracking in rough conditions.
Skis make all the difference in getting your sled to handle just how you like. We offer eight different styles 
of skis for you to choose from. Which one is right for you? Here are some tips on choosing the right one:
106
102  PARTS  CATEGORY
102  PARTS  TRACTION & CONTROL

messages.content:
Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2025 specification page:

SUSPENSION & SHOCK KITS
SUSPENSION
*While supplies last.
FRONT SUSPENSION WIDENING KIT 
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow), REV Gen4 Summit and Freeride with 36” RAS 3 
front suspension 
860201588
•	 Adjustable width 38.4”–40.1” (975–1,019 mm).
•	 Includes X package shock absorbers and springs.
RAS X FRONT SUSPENSION 
UPGRADE KIT (WITHOUT SHOCKS)
REV Gen4 MXZ, Renegade and Grand Touring with RAS 3 front suspension
860202187
•	 Update your sled RAS 3 to the new RAS X configuration.
•	 Provides wider ski stance offering sure-footed cornering 
with improved bump performance.
•	 Kit includes new spindles and A-arms and all necessary 
hardware.
•	 Compatible with Pilot X skis.
REMOTE COUPLER BLOCK 
ADJUSTER
REV Gen4 129” and 137” with rMotion rear suspension (2020 and prior), 
MXZ Sport, Renegade Sport, Grand Touring Sport (2021 and up)
860201902*
•	 Allows rider to attune ski-loading to current trail 
conditions.
•	 Quickly change coupler block position with a twist of the 
wrist.
•	 Go from uncoupled to your preferred coupled setting 
instantly.
•	 Coupled = less transfer, more weight on skis under 
acceleration.
•	 Uncoupled = more transfer, easier to lift skis under 
acceleration.
•	 Patent pending.
tMOTION ADJUSTABLE LIMITER 
STRAP
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow)
REV Gen4 (Narrow) with tMotion and cMotion rear suspensions  
(except Freeride 146” 2020 and prior and Backcountry X-RS)
860202439

860201861

•	 Quickly change limiter strap length by flipping a lever, to 
attune ride and handling to snow conditions and terrain. 
•	 Shortening keeps the front end lower and improves track 
approach angle. 
•	 Lengthening increases transfer and lifts the front end 
higher. 
•	 Adjustment is equivalent to 2 holes on a conventional strap
(1.3”/34 mm). 
•	 Slim, non-intrusive design.
•	 2 initial settings to choose from: holes 3 to 5 or 2 to 4 
(compared to conventional strap hole positions).
•	 US patent 9022156.
tMOTION RIGID ARM
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow)
860202413
•	 Convert a tMotion X to a fixed arm tMotion XT suspension.
•	 Fixed rear arm for technical riding in steep terrain.
•	 Improves sidehilling performance. 
•	 More precise and predictable while sacrificing some ease 
and agility.
T MOTION KIT
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow)
860202723
•	 Convert a tMotion XT fixed arm suspension into a tMotion X 
suspension.
•	 Articulated rear arm to increase maneuverability and 
agility.
NEW RAS RX FRONT SUSPENSION
REV Gen5 and REV Gen4 with RAS X front suspension and 42” ski stance 
(except Grand Touring)
860202843
•	 Provides better cornering stability and steering precision. 
•	 The taller ski leg and the new geometry are inspired by the 
RAS-RS.
92    ACCESSORIES    CATEGORY
92    ACCESSORIES    SUSPENSION & SHOCK KITS

Dexterity

Black (90)

446352 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL

	Waterproofness	
Dexterity	
Warmth

control.

wipe.

Extract all snowmobile model information from this LYNX 2024 specification page:

ROTAX
® ENGINES
Experience the advantage of XPS. Oil and care products engineered to extend the life of your ride, tested in the 
world’s harshest conditions, and designed to optimize your vehicle’s performance. Learn more at XPSlubricants.com
1  Observed metric horsepower based on internal dyno test performed in optimal conditions. 
2 Data based on internal engineering trail testing.
3  Data based on internal engineering trail testing in ECO mode.
4 Based on retail sale results as of December 31, 2019.
ROTAX 2-STROKE ENGINES
Heart-thumping power, lightweight  
design, proven reliability – E-TEC 
direct-injection engine technology  
delivers the most sought-after attributes 
in the snowmobile industry.
Our lineup of 2-stroke engines now 
includes the brand-new 600 EFI 
(Electronic Fuel Injection) engine. 
Reliable, affordable and easy to use, it’s 
an entry-level engine that far exceeds 
what you thought an entry-level engine 
had to be.
With E-TEC engine lineup you also get:
• Industry-leading fuel economy2
• Excellent oil economy
• Virtually no smoke or smell
• Light, linear throttle pull
• Automatic summerization process
850 E-TEC TURBO R
• 180 hp up to 2400 meters1
• World’s first factory-built 2-stroke 
turbo
850 E-TEC
• 165 horsepower1
• Down to 12.3 L/100 km2
600R E-TEC
• 125 horsepower1
• Down to 11.3 L/100 km2
600 EFI
• 85 horsepower1
• Down to 13.3 L/100 km2

E-TEC engines are the best-selling 
2-stroke engines in snowmobiling.4
ROTAX ACE™ 4-STROKE 
ENGINES
With the Advanced Combustion 
Efficiency (ACE) family of engines, 
BRP engineers optimized the 
combustion system, reduced 
mechanical friction, and freed intake 
and exhaust breathing. The result is 
the most efficient engines in 
snowmobiling. Not only are they 
efficient, they’re a pleasure to operate 
and own. Very little maintenance is 
required; they run smoothly and 
produce a nice, solid – yet quiet – 
sound.
900 ACE TURBO R 
• Rotax-designed turbocharger
• 180 horsepower1
• Cable-activated throttle  
with reconfigured iTC
900 ACE TURBO  
– 130 WITH iTC
• 130 horsepower1
• Down to 12.1 L/100 km3
900 ACE WITH iTC
• 3 cylinders
• 95 horsepower1 
• Down to 10.8 L/100 km3
600 ACE WITH iTC
• 2 cylinders
• 62 horsepower1
• Down to 8 L/100 km – the most fuel-
efficient in the entire industry3
ACE engines are the best-selling 
4-stroke engines in snowmobiling.4
INTELLIGENT  
THROTTLE CONTROL
Standard on the ACE engines, the iTC™ 
system delivers a whole different 
snowmobiling experience.
• Driving Modes: A button on the 
console enables you to select one 
of three driving modes. Standard 
mode ensures a smooth start and 
linear acceleration; Sport enables full 
performance and quicker acceleration; 
ECO® limits top speed and 
acceleration rates for a more relaxed, 
fuel-conserving ride.
• Finger Throttle (only on 600 ACE and 
900 ACE engines without Turbo): The 
throttle block can be rotate forward 
for use as a finger throttle, if preferred. 
Great for changing hand positions 
on a long ride and for more control 
through bumps.

Lynx ADVEX Sport Radiant Helmet (DOT/
ECE) with M-FORGE Composite shell.
ADVEX SPORT RADIANT HELMET
Black (90), Orange (12), White (01)
NEW
929081, 929126, 929130 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION:
ADVEX Sport Radiant Helmet (DOT/ECE) 
with M-FORGE Composite shell.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  4-year limited warranty.
•  Lightweight M-FORGE® Composite shell
•  Innovative and safe full face access opening
•  Adjustable and easily removable peak
•  Ampliﬁed heated visor visor with pivot contact 
system with integrated adjustable vent
•  Sun visor heated chamber.
•  eLinQ rear magnet connector.
•  Lightweight battery-less rear LED light for added rider safety.
•  Retractable amber sun visor for best vision in snow conditions.
•  Prescription eyeglasses friendly.
•  Adjustable humidity extractor vents.
•  NCS System: Reduces noise
•  Optional side LED utility light.
•  Optional VIBE Mesh made for winter integrated communication 
system, with never lose power feature when plugged in
•  Neck skirt to reduce air intrusion.
•  Humidity control with breathguard mask system
•  Operate all features with gloved hands.
•  2 shell sizes and 4 EPS size for better ﬁt and comfort.
•  Ratcheting quick-release chin strap.
•  Recyclable helmet shell for minimal environmental impact.
•  Aerodynamic shape to reduce neck fatigue.
•  1895 g ± for size large.
•  1965 g ± for size large with peak
•  D.O.T. and ECE 2206 certiﬁed

assemblies like short blocks, cylinders and crankshafts.

On the mountain it’s just you and 
your sled.

compromise. You wouldn’t let anything 
come between you and your ride. Not 
now, when you’re living so fully for and 
in the moment. Ready to drill deeper 
into drifts and drives. You and your

TOE-HOLDS, FOOTRESTS

TOE-HOLDS
*While supplies last.
TUNNEL REINFORCEMENT
REV Gen5 (Trail), REV Gen4, MXZ and Renegade (except Renegade 
Backcountry, Backcountry X and X-RS, MXZ X-RS)
860201584 • White*
860201465 • Black
• Additional strength and traction along the running board.
• Machined aluminum extrusions. 
• Colors to add some style.
• Provides more support and boot traction for  
aggressive riders.
TUNNEL REINFORCEMENT
REV Gen4 Summit Neo, Summit SP, Backcountry, Backcountry X
860201636 • Black
860201730 • Octane Blue
• Additional strength and traction along the running board.
• Machined aluminum extrusions. 
• Colors to add some style.
• Provides more support and boot traction for  
aggressive riders.
• Not compatible with tMotion Adjustable Limiter 
(860201861).
TUNNEL REINFORCEMENT
REV Gen4 Summit X (except with Expert package), Freeride 154”–165” 
860201638 • Black
860201783 • Lava Red*
860201734 • Octane Blue*
• Additional strength and traction along the running board.
• Machined aluminum extrusions. 
• Colors to add some style.
• Provides more support and boot traction for  
aggressive riders.
• Not compatible with tMotion Adjustable Limiter 
(860201861).
RAIL REINFORCEMENT
REV Gen4 146” to 165” with tMotion and cMotion rear suspensions
860201005
• Increases rail strength and longevity.
RAIL REINFORCEMENT 
REV Gen5, REV Gen4, XM, XP 146” and up with tMotion and cMotion rear 
suspensions
860201464
• Lightweight cast aluminum construction.
• Increases rail strength and longevity.
• Can replace stock stiffener on Freeride.
REWIND COVER 
REV Gen4 (Narrow) Summit, Backcountry, Freeride
860201463
• Covers rewind handle to let your knees slide smoothly.
• Allows installation of Knee Pads (860201917).
ADJUSTABLE TOE-HOLDS 
REV Gen4 16” Summit (except Neo), Freeride, Backcountry and 
Expedition 16”
860201765
• Die-cast aluminum part.
• Allows user to adjust toe-hold position for different riding 
styles and control.
• Foldable for easy floorboard access.
• Adjustable 3” (7.6 cm) rearward and 1.5” (3.8 cm) upward.
• Forward/backward and top/down adjustments.
86

88  CATEGORY  SEGMENT
88  CATEGORY  SEGMENT
XPS Lubricants and  
Care products are expertly 
engineered to extend the 
life of your ride. 
We pair the best engineers with the 
best chemists to create products that 
exceed tomorrow's technology with 
the knowledge from an insiders 
standpoint. 
No Shortcuts
Tested on all engine platforms and  
all materials used in manufacturing 
today's powersports vehicles - not 
just one or two. We benchmarked 
against the best in every category to 
ensure XPS products meet or exceed  
each before offering them to you. 
They perform and protect  
in the harshest conditions.
From desert heat to saltwater  
corrosion to the coldest 
temperatures on earth - XPS 
products have been proven to 
protect and perform.
Long Live
Adventure

56  ACCESSORIES  WIND PROTECTION & MIRRORS
WIND PROTECTION & MIRRORS
NEW
ADJUSTABLE WINDSHIELD - MEDIUM 
TO HIGH
Radien² (except Deep Snow)
860202615
• Adjustable range of 17” (44 cm) to 21” (54 cm).
• Lever allows quick changes to amount of wind protection. 
• Compatible with Glove Box Extension (860202436).
• Includes Windshield Support (517307974).
• Side Deflectors (860202437) and adapters (860202784) required for installation.
NEW
MEDIUM WINDSHIELD
Radien² (except Deep Snow)
860202471
• Medium height - 17” (43 cm) in length. 
• Offers additionnal wind protection with integrated style. 
• Injection molded for clarity. 
• Compatible with Windshield-Mount Mirrors. 
• Complete kit includes windshield, side deflectors, windshield support & hardware.
• Side Deflectors (860202437) included.
• Side Deflector adapters (860202784) required for installation.
NEW
LOW WINDSHIELD
Radien² (except Deep Snow)
860202470
• Low height - 14” (36 cm) in length. 
• Offers additionnal wind protection with integrated style. 
• Injection molded for clarity. 
• Includes windshield support.
NEW
ULTRA HIGH WINDSHIELD
Radien² (except Deep Snow)
860202435
• 25” (64 cm) in length. 
• Additional wind protection with integrated style. 
• Compatible with Windshield-Mount Mirrors (860202679).
• Include Windshield Support.
• Side Deflectors (860202437) and adapters (860202784) required for installation.
NEW
ULTRA LOW WINDSHIELD
Radien² (except Deep Snow)
860202624
• Ultra low height - 8” (22 cm) in length. 
• Additional wind protection with integrated style. 
• Injection molded for clarity. 
• Includes windshield support.
NEW
XL HANDGUARD KIT
Radien², Radien, Radien-X
860202783
• Provides additional wind protection for the rider’s hands 
while allowing good vision on the trail. 
• The complete kit features clear, larger deflectors, black/grey colored interchangeable caps, 
and holding arm. 
•Stylish design. 
•Compatible with Pivoting Mirror Kit For Handguards (860200893). 
•Sold in pairs. 
•Does not fit with Medium to Ultra High Windshields with side deflectors (fixed or adjustable).

messages.content:
Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2026 specification page:

MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS
EXTENDED LIFE PRE-MIXED COOLANT
619590728 • 1 qt / 946 ml
•	 Antifreeze/coolant contains the correct dilution and 
the necessary additives to prevent corrosion and inhibit 
cavitation in BRP cooling systems.
•	 Long-life, 5-year formula specially formulated for BRP 
vehicles.
•	 Superior heat transfer.
•	 Ideal replacement for vehicles that normally use a 2-year 
antifreeze/coolant (green).
•	 5 years (orange).
DOT 4 BRAKE FLUID
9779207 • 12 fl. oz. / 355 ml
•	 Meets or exceeds all DOT3 and DOT4 brake fluid 
requirements.
•	 High-temperature formula resists fade, and also conditions 
seals and O-rings in braking systems.
OIL FILTER
420956124 
•	 900 ACE, 900 ACE Turbo, 600 ACE and 1203 engines.
SYNTHETIC CHAINCASE OIL
9779185 • 12 fl. oz. / 355 ml
•	 Specially developed for high-performance Ski‑Doo models, 
it represents the best in state-of-the-art chaincase 
lubrication.
•	 This multigrade full-synthetic formula flows well at cold 
temperatures and won’t break down at high temperatures.
•	 Made with additives that protect internal components 
from wear and corrosion and also conditions seals.
•	 Not for use in 2-speed snowmobile transmissions on 
Expedition, Skandic utility models.
SYNTHETIC GREASE SUSPENSION
9779226 • 14 oz./ 400 g
•	 Designed to work specifically with the components found in 
Can-Am and Ski‑Doo vehicle suspensions.
•	 It is highly stable and offers optimal lubrication at both 
extreme cold and high temperatures while protecting 
suspension components from dirt and moisture, as well as 
corrosion under extreme washout conditions.
XPS ICE INTAKE COOLING ENHANCER
9779362 • 1 US gal / 3.785 L
•	 XPS Ice is a sophisticated blend of methanol and filtered 
water. 
•	 Specially formulated to cool the air intake charge of 
engines in the water injection system.
XPS SPLINE GREASE
9779472 • 4 oz.
•	 Enhanced rust and corrosion resistance.
•	 Protects against seizure, heat-freeze, galling, rust and 
corrosion.
136    MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS    CATEGORY
136    MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS    OILS & MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS

GLOVES
Army Green (77), Black (90)
EXPEDITION GLOVES
446337 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
•	 Extra warm gloves for comfort in all riding 
conditions.
•	 Use for trail and deep snow riding.
Performance: 

	Waterproofness	
Dexterity	
Warmth
•	 Top hand: 200 g PrimaLoft® Gold.
•	 Palm: 133 g PrimaLoft® Gold. 
•	 Waterproof, windproof and breathable glove insert.
•	 Naturally moisture-wicking and antimicrobial wool 
blend lining.
•	 Leather palm and fingers with grip reinforcement.
•	 Touchscreen index finger.
•	 Nose wipe on thumb.
MEN’S
Black (90)
BC ASPECT LONG GLOVES
446352 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
•	 Breathable glove with some insulation perfect for 
moderate temperatures.
•	 Use in deep snow riding.
Performance: 

	Waterproofness	
Dexterity	
Warmth
•	 Pittards® goat leather – resistant to the elements, 
stain resistant and durable leather.
•	 Sympatex® fabric 2 L. 
•	 Insulated backhand and palm, for warmth without 
compromising grip (60 gr Primaloft Gold/Grip Control 
at palm).
•	 Padded knuckles in nylon Cordura® for better 
protection.
•	 Outdry technology membrane waterproof and 
windproof. 
•	 Maximum breathability with perforated leather 
insert between fingers. 
•	 Xstatic mesh lined for antibacterial and stay dry 
moisture management.
•	 Wide and long cuff with elastic cord adjustment 
and puller at hem to fit over the sleeve.
•	 Inside adhesive technology for a better grip control.
•	 Shaped and articulated fingers for maximum grip 
control.
•	 Conductive leather at index.
•	 Wiper on left index + suede at back thumb for lens 
wipe.
Black (90)
BC ASPECT SHORT GLOVES
446354 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
•	 Breathable glove with some insulation perfect for 
moderate temperatures.
•	 Use in deep snow riding.

	Waterproofness	
Dexterity	
Warmth

stain resistant and durable leather.

•	 Insulated back of hand and palm, for warmth 
without compromising grip (60 gr Primaloft Gold/
Grip Control at palm).
•	 Padded knuckles in nylon Cordura® for better 
protection.
•	 Outdry technology membrane waterproof and 
windproof. 
•	 Maximum flexibility with stretch fabric insertion at 
knucklebone.
•	 Xstatic mesh lined for antibacterial and stay dry 
moisture management.
•	 Wrist strap adjustment with Velcro to fit under a 
sleeve.
•	 Extra grip leather at palm and thumb. 
•	 Shaped and articulated fingers for maximum grip 
control.
•	 Conductive leather at index.
•	 Wiper on left index + suede at back thumb for lens 
wipe.

•	 Insulated back of hand and palm, for warmth 
without compromising grip (60 gr Primaloft Gold/
Grip Control at palm).
•	 Padded knuckles in nylon Cordura® for better 
protection.
•	 Outdry technology membrane waterproof and 
windproof. 
•	 Maximum flexibility with stretch fabric insertion at 
knucklebone.
•	 Xstatic mesh lined for antibacterial and stay dry 
moisture management.
•	 Wrist strap adjustment with Velcro to fit under a 
sleeve.
•	 Extra grip leather at palm and thumb. 
•	 Shaped and articulated fingers for maximum grip 
control.
•	 Conductive leather at index.
•	 Wiper on left index + suede at back thumb for lens 
wipe.
152    APPAREL    GLOVES

REINFORCEMENT 
FABRIC
Often added to garment zones 
that need extra durability, such 
as arms, back hem, inner legs, 
and crotch for tough yet  
flexible comfort.
RADIANT  
CORE
Reflects heat back towards you 
for reliable, all-day warmth even 
at high speeds.
PRIMALOFT®
A high-performance insulation 
with the full spectrum of 
benefits to brave the elements. 
Warmer, drier, softer and more 
compressible than any other 
synthetic insulation.
SYMPATEX®
Coatings that provide 
maximum waterproofness, 
windproofness and 
breathability.
YKK
We use the world's best 
- YKK zippers - recognized 
for quality and reliability.
CONNECTOR 
SYSTEM
Some of our Lynx jackets have 
provisions built in for a heated 
shield wire - riders can leave 
the wire in the jacket securely 
fastened and out of the way.
TECHNOLOGIES
OUR RIDING GEAR AND TECHNICAL WEAR ARE BUILT WITH 
ADVANCED TECHNOLOGIES THAT PROTECT YOU WITH WARMTH, 
WATERPROOFNESS, LIGHTWEIGHT AND BREATHABILITY.

NEW MEN’S VASA X-TEAM EDITION JACKET
456003 • S, M, MT, L, LT, XL, XLT, 2XL, 3XL
• Style featuring the ExoFloat System.
• X-Team Edition
• Ideal for crossover active riding.
• Use on trails with our Vasa Highpants.
• 200g insulation + 60g ExoFloat System
• Sealed critical seams and logos.
• Polar fleece at front of body and top of arms.
• Reflective details on back and sleeves for maximum visibility.

 assistance

454809 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL

screen technology.

860202436

CELLPHONE HOLDER
REV Gen5, REV Gen4
860202372
• New design is independent of the Glove Box Extension 
door.
• Water resistant door allows for perfect phone positioning.
• Heating element preserves cell phone battery longer.
• Features capacitive and resistive touch screen technology. 
• Spring system in back plate automatically adjusts for 
thickness.
• Fits all cellphones within 7.2” (185 mm) x 3.3” (85 mm) x 
0.6” (15 mm) dimensions. 
• Works with almost all charger wires.
• Does not include cell phone or charging wires.
• Can be used with or without windshield.
• Requires Glovebox Extension (860202436, 860202501 or 
860201249) depending on the vehicle.
• USB intelligent Power Outlet Kit (860202433) required  
to charge cellphone.
• Requires Harness (515178153) for installation on REV Gen4.

HANDLEBAR ACCESSORIES
HANDGUARDS
HANDLEBAR MUFFS
REV Gen5, REV Gen4 (except Grand Touring 2016 and up)
860202812
•	 Ultra-warm muffs with faux-fur liner for extreme cold 
conditions. 
•	 Thermoformed construction allows muffs to keep their 
shape and provides more space for hand movement. 
•	 Easy to install and remove with gloves on.
•	 Large transparent section allows visibility of control 
switches. 
Note: Never use handlebar muffs with finger throttle lever.
PERFORMANCE SMALL DIAMETER 
HANDLEBAR
REV Gen5, REV Gen4
860202722 • Black
860201974 • Silver
•	 Narrow design used for more agile precise maneuvers 
found in mountain applications or in trail applications, ideal 
for smaller hand grip.
•	 Smaller diameter provides a lighter, easier grip.
•	 20 mm (0.79 in) grip, 22 mm (0.87 in) clamper diameter at 
riser.
•	 Less hand fatigue.
•	 Heater elements and grips included and installed.
BRAKE RESERVOIR GUARD
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow), REV Gen4 Summit and Freeride
860202171
•	 Increases impact protection for the brake reservoir.
•	 Window to see fluid level.
•	 Cast aluminum construction.
•	 Detailed technical finish.
EASY THROTTLE
REV Gen5, REV Gen4 (except 600 ACE, 900 ACE and 900 ACE Turbo) 
(except Neo)
860202719
•	 Less hand fatigue.
•	 Throttle closer to the bars allowing a better grip on the 
handlebar.
•	 20% reduction in pressure to use.
•	 Included on Neo+.
HANDGUARD CAPS
Vehicles with Transparent 
Handguards, Dark Smoke 
Handguards or Flexible 
Handguards
860201344 •  
Sunburst Yellow / Black
860201345 •  
Race Orange / Black
860201346 •  
Black / Grey
860201347 •  
White / Black

860201648 •  
Lava Grey
860201457 •  
Orange Crush / Black
860201649 •  
Manta Green / Black
860202098 •  
Octane Blue / Black

•	 Colored caps let you customize your look.
•	 Sold in pairs.
ADJUSTABLE BRAKE LEVER
REV Gen5, REV Gen4
860202222
•	 Toolless design adjusts easily.
•	 Shape and size is optimized for 1 or 2 fingers.
•	 Total adjustment range of 20 mm/0.8 inches.
•	 Up to 15.5 mm/0.6” closer or 4.5 mm/0.18” farther away vs. 
standard lever.
SIGNATURE LED LIGHTS FOR 
HANDGUARDS 
REV Gen4, with Transparent, Dark Smoke or Flexible Handguards
860201587
•	 Deliver a unique look at night.
•	 Replace stock handguard cap with LED light.
•	 Include wiring harness.
•	 Sold in pairs.
