146  HOW TO MEASURE
HEIGHT: without shoes, standing 
with heels and back against a wall.
HEAD: around your head, from 
the center of the forehead, above 
the ears and over the natural 
bump at the back of the head.
ARM LENGTH: let the hands hang 
down on the side in a slightly bent 
position. Measure from the center 
of the back of your neck, along the 
length of your arm, to the wrist.
CHEST: measure under 
your arm, around the fullest 
part of your chest. 
WAIST: immediately 
below the lowest rib.
HIPS: across the fullest 
part of the seat.
INSEAM: without shoes, 
from crotch to the ﬂoor.
GLOVES: Measure palm width.
BOOTS: Foot lenght 
from heel to toe.
•  For best results, have someone 
else take measurements. 
•  Measure body in underwear. 
•  Tape must be snug but not tight. 
•  If measurements fall between 
two sizes, order  the larger size.
HOW TO MEASURE
WHAT CODE REPRESENTS 
YOUR SIZE?
1   Find your size.
2    The corresponding code is 
THE CODE you use to complete 
the part number on your order. 
Example: 440 227________90 
Size: M = code “06”, Therefore 
440 227 06 90

146  HOW TO MEASURE
HEIGHT: without shoes, standing 
with heels and back against a wall.
HEAD: around your head, from 
the center of the forehead, above 
the ears and over the natural 
bump at the back of the head.
ARM LENGTH: let the hands hang 
down on the side in a slightly bent 
position. Measure from the center 
of the back of your neck, along the 
length of your arm, to the wrist.
CHEST: measure under 
your arm, around the fullest 
part of your chest. 
WAIST: immediately 
below the lowest rib.
HIPS: across the fullest 
part of the seat.
INSEAM: without shoes, 
from crotch to the ﬂoor.
GLOVES: Measure palm width.
BOOTS: Foot lenght 
from heel to toe.
•  For best results, have someone 
else take measurements. 
•  Measure body in underwear. 
•  Tape must be snug but not tight. 
•  If measurements fall between 
two sizes, order  the larger size.
HOW TO MEASURE
WHAT CODE REPRESENTS 
YOUR SIZE?
1   Find your size.
2    The corresponding code is 
THE CODE you use to complete 
the part number on your order. 
Example: 440 227________90 
Size: M = code “06”, Therefore 
440 227 06 90

messages.content:
Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2024 specification page:

ANTI-CORROSIVE LUBRICANT
619590722 • Canada only • 12 oz./ 340 g
• Multipurpose lubricant that can also be used to prevent 
rust, corrosion and moisture intrusion.
• It contains extreme pressure additives that work as an 
all-around lubricant for just about anywhere lubrication is 
needed.
SYNTHETIC CHAINCASE OIL
9779185 • 12 fl. oz. / 355 ml
• Specially developed for high-performance Ski-Doo models, 
it represents the best in state-of-the-art chaincase 
lubrication.
• This multigrade full-synthetic formula flows well at cold 
temperatures and won’t break down at high temperatures.
• Made with additives that protect internal components 
from wear and corrosion and also conditions seals.
• Not for use in 2-speed snowmobile transmissions on 
Expedition, Skandic utility models.
SYNTHETIC GREASE SUSPENSION
9779226 • 14 oz./ 400 g
• Designed to work specifically with the components found in 
Can-Am and Ski-Doo vehicles suspensions.
• It is highly stable and offers optimal lubrication at both 
extreme cold and high temperatures while protecting 
suspension components from dirt and moisture, as well as 
corrosion under extreme washout conditions.
SYNCHROMESH TRANSMISSION SYNTHETIC OIL
9779211    • 24 fl. oz. / 710 ml
• Uses a unique combination of synthetic base stocks and 
additives that allow higher loads, superior shear stability  
and reduced oxidation compared to other synthetics and 
conventional API GL-5 gear oils.
• Its tremendous thermal stability and constant viscosity 
give exceptional wear protection and superior performance 
for excellent low-temperature characteristics and 
improved gear protection at higher temperatures.
• Recommended for use in all Ski-Doo and Lynx 
synchromesh transmissions requiring 75W-140 API GL-5 
gear oils.
• Offers added assurance during extended drain intervals.
• Exceeds API GL-5 specifications.
FUEL STABILIZER
9779183 • 8 fl. oz. / 236 ml
• Ethanol-compatible and will stabilize fuel in your tank to 
keep it from breaking down and causing hard starting,  
throttle hesitation and poor run quality.
• Ethanol attracts moisture, and this product contains 
powerful anti-corrosion additives to protect fuel  
system components.
• Prevents problems associated with E10 fuels.
STORAGE OIL
619590094 • 12 oz./ 350 g
• High-performance fogging oil designed to protect internal 
engine parts from rust and corrosion.
• It coats engine internals throughout the whole storage 
period and is burned away through combustion when 
engine is started.
• Protects engines during non-use or storage.
• Burns complete upon start up.
CATEGORY  MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS  119 
OILS & MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS  MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS  119

142!!APPAREL!!LYNX X SVALA
LYNX X SVALA MERINO HYBRID JACKET
659144 • 2XS, XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION:
Comfortable Hybrid jacket for multiuse. This jacket is made of 
high-quality Extra warm merino knit and added windproofness 
with panels in colla, neck, chest and front sleeves.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Merino knit and windproof panels
•  Unisex
•  Slim-ﬁt
•  Front zipper
•  Two Front pockets with zipper
•  Flat seams
•  Thumb loops
Black (90)
LYNX X SVALA MERINO LOUNGE PANTS
659146 • 2XS, XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION:
Elastic and cosy Merino pants for leisure. They are actually so Trendy 
that you want to wear them at town and everywhere. These pants are 
made of 100% high-quality Merino wool knit. 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Unisex
•  Slim-ﬁt
•  Side pockets
•  Elastic waistband
•  Flat seams
Black (90)
LYNX X SVALA POWERSTRETCH PRO JACKET
659143 • 2XS, XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION:
An elastic and warm Fleece jacket for work and leisure. This jacket 
is made of high-quality Polartec Power Stretch Pro with a moisture-
wicking ﬂeece on the inside and a wear-resistant lint-free polyester 
on the outside. 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Unisex
•  Slim-ﬁt
•  Front zipper
•  Chest pocket
•  Two Front pockets
•  Flat seams
•  Thumb loops
Black (90)

metadata.text:
146  HOW TO MEASURE
HEIGHT: without shoes, standing 
with heels and back against a wall.
HEAD: around your head, from 
the center of the forehead, above 
the ears and over the natural 
bump at the back of the head.
ARM LENGTH: let the hands hang 
down on the side in a slightly bent 
position. Measure from the center 
of the back of your neck, along the 
length of your arm, to the wrist.
CHEST: measure under 
your arm, around the fullest 
part of your chest. 
WAIST: immediately 
below the lowest rib.
HIPS: across the fullest 
part of the seat.
INSEAM: without shoes, 
from crotch to the ﬂoor.
GLOVES: Measure palm width.
BOOTS: Foot lenght 
from heel to toe.
•  For best results, have someone 
else take measurements. 
•  Measure body in underwear. 
•  Tape must be snug but not tight. 
•  If measurements fall between 
two sizes, order  the larger size.
HOW TO MEASURE
WHAT CODE REPRESENTS 
YOUR SIZE?
1   Find your size.
2    The corresponding code is 
THE CODE you use to complete 
the part number on your order. 
Example: 440 227________90 
Size: M = code “06”, Therefore 
440 227 06 90

TRAIL LinQ PASSENGER SEAT
REV Gen5 16” (except Grand Touring),  
REV Gen4 16” (except Grand Touring)
860202325
•	 The ultimate modular seating solution. 
•	 Quickly changes from riding solo to riding with a passenger.
•	 Provides comfortable, ergonomically correct positions for 
both driver and passenger. 
•	 Easy toolless clip in attachment with the LinQ system.
•	 Compatible with LinQ Lock.
•	 Requires LinQ 1 + 1 Removable Rack (860202749) or LinQ 
1 + 1 Rack (860202785 or 860202414) for installation.
•	 Requires Trail Wide Seat (860202523) or Trail Narrow Heated 
Seat (860202819) or Trail Narrow Seat (860202644) or Trail 
Wide Heated Seat (860202645) for installation on Summit, 
Freeride, Tundra, REV Gen4 Renegade (Enduro and Sport).
LinQ 1 + 1 RACK
REV Gen5 and REV Gen4 16” (except Grand Touring and 850 E-TEC Turbo R)
860202414
•	 Required for LinQ Passenger Premium Heated Seat 
(860202536), Trail LinQ Passenger Premium Non‑Heated 
Seat (860202917) and Trail LinQ Passenger Seat 
(860202325) use.
•	 Great looks with or without the passenger seat mounted.
•	 Provides an additional LinQ position (for soft accessories 
only) when passenger seat isn’t in use.
•	 Made of lightweight die-cast aluminum.
LinQ PASSENGER SEAT HEATED 
GRIPS 
REV Gen5 (except Grand Touring), REV Gen4 (except Grand Touring) 
860202535
•	 Provides heat to the passenger grips. 
•	 Easy to disconnect when removing passenger seat.
•	 Includes complete handle assembly.
•	 Requires Seat Wiring Harness (515178199) for installation 
on REV Gen4 models. See instruction sheet.
LinQ 1 + 1 REMOVABLE RACK
REV Gen5 16” including Turbo models (except Grand Touring),  
REV Gen4 16” (except Grand Touring)
860202749
•	 Quick, easy installation with LinQ system.
•	 Allows battery maintenance with the removable option.
•	 Required for LinQ Passenger Premium Heated Seat 
(860202536), Trail LinQ Passenger Premium Non‑Heated 
Seat (860202917) and Trail LinQ Passenger Seat 
(860202325) use.
•	 Great look with or without the passenger seat mounted.
•	 Provides an additional LinQ position (for soft accessories 
only) when passenger seat isn’t in use.
•	 Made of lightweight die-cast aluminum.
TRAIL LinQ PASSENGER PREMIUM 
NON‑HEATED SEAT
REV Gen5 16” (except Grand Touring), REV Gen4 16” (except Grand Touring)
860202917
•	 The ultimate modular seating solution. 
•	 Quickly changes from riding solo to riding with a passenger.
•	 Provides comfortable, ergonomically correct positions for 
both driver and passenger. 
•	 Includes Passenger Backrest (860202659) and seat 
handles.
•	 Compatible with LinQ locking system.
•	 Requires LinQ 1+1 Removable Rack (860202749) or LinQ 1+1 
Rack (860202414 or 860202785) for installation.
•	 Requires Trail Wide Seat (860202523) or Trail Narrow Heated 
Seat (860202819) or Trail Narrow Seat (860202644) or Trail 
Wide Heated Seat (860202645) for installation on Summit, 
Freeride, Tundra, REV Gen4 Renegade (Enduro and Sport).
•	 Compatible with LinQ Passenger Seat Heated Grips 
(860202535).
TRAIL LinQ 1 + 1 SEAT WITH 
BACKREST
REV Gen5 16”,  
REV Gen4 16”
860202348
•	 The ultimate in modular seating.
•	 Allows quick changes between 1-up and 2-up riding.
•	 Ergonomically correct positions for driver and passenger.
•	 Two easy toolless steps: 
1. Clip in seat. 
2. Add LinQ 1+1 Backrest.
•	 Battery Cover with Support (860201407) required for vehicle 
without battery.

120!!APPAREL!!STAMINA
LYNX STAMINA ENDURO PANTS
651128 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
These crossover highpants with Sympatex 
fabrics and mid-weight insulation to keep 
you warm and dry whether you’re carving 
up trails, exploring the woods or in open 
space. Most comfortable insulated riding 
gear for most demanding rides. For Lynx 
customer who demands technical qualities 
and workable gear in many environments 
and conditions. Performance lightly 
insulated pants for riding on and o! trail.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  100% waterproof, 100% windproof, 
optimally breathable Sympatex material.
•  All seams sealed
•  Cordura reinforcement fabric 
on high wear areas.
•  Primaloft Black Eco insulation 
Primaloft Black 100 grams
•  Sporty, articulated ﬁtting to give 
the optimal movement in riding
•  High front and lower back bib.
•  Stretch panels at sides and back
•  Adjustable suspenders, crossed at back.
•  One spacious cargo pocket with gusset
•  Preshaped and padded knees 
with removable knee pads
•  Flexible storm gaiters with snap 
system attachment to boots
•  Killer loop D-ring at waist
•  Bip pocket
•  Full-length water repellent YKK 
2-way zippers at front and sides
•  Reﬂective ﬁlm taping for visibility

Warmly insulated jacket for 
Trail, crossover, adventure 
& Utility segments.

Warm jacket with a racing look  
for Trail.
WARMTH
MULTI USE
REFLECTIVE VISIBILITY

 WINDPROOF 
REFLECTIVE 
FLEECE LINED
Stay warm, dry and comfortable even in the 
harshest conditions.
Arctic winds. Ice. Sub-zero temperatures. 
Whatever the winter throws at you won’t stop 
you from going all the way: experiencing your 
longest and wildest adventure yet, or getting 
the job done. So grab that extra hour on the 
snow. One more trail. One more mile. First on, 
last o!. All winter.

messages.content:
Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2025 specification page:

NEO SUSPENSION
K YB SHOCKS
FRONT SUSPENSION KIT (36”) 
REV-XM, XS, XP
860201153
•	 To update your sled to the REV-XM Summit X with T3 
package.
•	 Delivers the agility of the original S-36 handling package, 
plus the benefits of the RAS 2.
•	 Better straightline tracking on big bumps.
•	 Lighter weight.
•	 Great styling.
•	 HPG shocks.
•	 Ski stance adjustable from 35.7” (90 cm) to 37.4” (95 cm).
SWAY BAR QUICK-DISCONNECT 
LINK KIT 
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow), REV Gen4 Summit and Freeride, XM and XP 
Summit 2013 to 2020
860200811
•	 Kit allows you to utilize the benefits of a sway bar on rough 
trails and quickly disconnect it for sidehilling.
•	 Sold individually.
RETROFITTABLE SWAY BAR
Neo
860202206
•	 Kit gives the rider the benefit of a sway bar for stability  
on trails.
KYB PERFORMANCE SHOCKS KIT
REV Gen5 and REV Gen4 with RAS X suspension (except SAS) 
860202466
•	 Race Edition KYB shock absorbers. 
•	 Piggy Back 46 mm bodies with 16 mm shaft. 
•	 Feature separate adjustments for high- and low-speed 
compression plus rebound damping. 
•	 Kashima coated for friction-free performance and long life.
•	 Fits RAS X front suspension.
SHOCK UPGRADE KIT
Neo Base
860202210
•	 Premium front shock upgrade for base Neo model.
•	 KYB 36 mm high pressure gas shock absorber.
•	 Spring preload adjustment.
•	 Reverse mounting (body up) to minimize unsprung weight.
REAR SUSPENSION COIL
Neo
860202457
•	 Higher capacity springs for use with passengers or larger 
riders.
CATEGORY    ACCESSORIES    93  
SUSPENSION & SHOCK KITS    ACCESSORIES    93

With Ski-Doo parts, you get the peace of mind of a FULL TWO-YEAR WARRANTY.  
And if they’re installed by your authorized BRP dealer, labor is covered too.  
BRP-rebuilt components are a cost-effective solution. 
Ski-Doo-rebuilt parts carry the same two-year warranty for major assemblies  
like short blocks, cylinders and crankshafts.
* Purchased at an authorized BRP dealership/distributor or on a BRP-authorized online store. Other exclusions may apply, see complete limited warranty  
or contact your Ski-Doo authorized dealer. Unless otherwise stipulated or required by law. This limited warranty does not apply to factory installed accessories.

FISKARS SPLITTING AXE X11
860202577  •  includes 
leather protective case
The X11 splitting ax is a handy tool for splitting smaller timber with a diameter of 10-
20 cm. Easy to use with just one hand. Also excellent for making campfire lighters. 
Fits perfectly in the ax holder of the large 135L Cargo Box 860202085.
RACING BRAKE PADS
REX
619690016
78  ACCESSORIES  UNIVERSAL
FISKARS AXE NORDEN WITH LEATHER 
COVER
860202576  • includes 
leather protective case
Norden’s N12 splitting ax is made in Finland. It combines durability, perfect blade 
and shank balance, advanced blade shape and an extremely sharp angle that 
together maximize product performance. The shaft of the ax is made of high quality 
hickory wood, which gives it a natural look and feel. Comes with a leather protective 
case. Fits perfectly in the ax holder of the large 135L Cargo Box 860202085.
FISKARS GARDEN SAW L SW75
860202578
The Xtract ™ garden saw (L) SW75 is a very efficient saw specially designed for fresh wood. 
Fiskars Xtract ™ saws have a retractable blade mechanism and a fixed belt loop, so the saw 
can be carried and stored safely. The hollow handle allows the blade to be stored inside 
the handle during transport. Can be attached to a large 135 L Cargo Box 860202085.
PULLING STRAP
Radien / Radien-X 
Radien²
860202382
• Save your back and get unstuck the easy way.  
• Lightweight,compact, affordable.  
• Extremely robust material.  
• Available in red only.  
• 2 per pack.
TUNNEL GRIP PLATES
860200164

REV Gen5 (Deep Snow), REV Gen4 with 165 mm riser and longer, REV-XM, 
XP, XR, XU Tundra
860201564 • Long 

860201550 • Short
• Innovative 2-pocket carry bag for secure storage around 
the steering riser block.
• 3W heated insulated pocket design reduces the chance 
of water bottles freezing and increases the battery life of 
small electronic equipment.
• Includes RCA adaptor kit.
• Requires Heated Visor Kit (860201234) for REV-XU, XM, 
XS, XP, XR, (860201283) for REV Gen4 and (860202338) for 
REV Gen5, sold separately.
LinQ DEEP SNOW SEAT BAG – 5 L
REV Gen4 Summit and Freeride (without battery)
860201274
• 5 liter (1.3 US gallon, 305 cu in) capacity.
• Improved design with greater capacity than the LinQ Seat 
Bag (860201355).
• Thermoformed hard plastic base.
• Requires Low Profile Battery Compartment Cover 
(860201505).
SKI-DOO PULLING STRAP 
860202195
• Save your back and get unstuck the easy way.
• Lightweight, compact, affordable.
• Extremely robust material.
• Available in yellow only. 2 per pack.
SAW & HANDLE REPLACEMENT FOR SHOVEL
520002004
• D-shaped handle.
NEW LinQ SNOWBOARD/SKI RACK
REV Gen5, REV Gen4 16”, 146” and longer 
Fits short tunnel
860202741
• Newly redesigned. 
• Simpler, quicker and easier way to attach skis or 
snowboards. 
• Fits 2 snowboards or 1 pair of skis and poles. 
• Easy to adjust from skis to boards or back in seconds. 
• Fits all sizes of skis, snowboards and snowsurfs. 
• Easy release straps can be operated with gloves on. 
• Rubber cushions protect edges and hold ski poles securely 
without damage. 
• Non-intrusive positioning. 
• Compatible with stock bumper requires reinforcement kit 
(860202742). 
• Compatible with new hitch and Adventure rear bumpers 
(Casting included).
• Requires LinQ Cargo Base Kit (860201806) on REV Gen4 16’’ 
tunnels for 2021 and prior models.
SHOVEL WITH SAW HANDLE
860201919
• Design with better cutting edge.
• Features integrated saw handle.
• Blade flips 90° to pull snow away.
• Can be dismantled for easy storage.

860201416

SCREW STYLE DECK HOOK
860200994
•	 Most common.

old style bar and crank into or make your own holes.
SUPERTRAC KIT
860201413 • 12”
860201414 • 24”
860201415 • 48”

caps and all mounting hardware. 
T-STYLE DECK HOOK
860200995

RAMP CROSSBAR PROTECTORS
2 pieces with 6 screws
10 pieces with 30 screws
24 pieces with 72 screws
860201672
860201673
860201674
•	 Enhance and protect your ramp investment.
•	 Designed to mount over 1” ramp crossbars on solid,  
double and tri-fold loading ramps.
•	 2 pieces together helps prevent stud damage to  
loading ramps from snowmobile-studded tracks while 
adding traction.
REAR SUPERCLAMP WITH SUPERTRAC
860201425
•	 Snowmobile tie-down system for rail.
•	 Silicone rubber pads to protect snowmobile suspension 
skid.
•	 Tension adjustment knob—fits all snowmobiles.

•	 Padlock compatible, becomes a theft deterrent.

SEAT STOR AGE
LinQ TRAIL SEAT BAG – 11 L
REV Gen5 (Trail, Crossover), REV Gen4 (Narrow) MXZ, Backcountry and 
Renegade (except Sport models and MXZ Neo)
860201275
•	 11 liter (2.9 US gallon, 671 cu in) capacity.
•	 Thermoformed hard plastic base, semi-rigid sides and top.
•	 Vehicles with pull start require the Battery Cover 
(860201407). 
LinQ SEAT BAG – 4 L
REV Gen5 (Trail, Crossover), REV Gen4 (Narrow, except Neo)
860201355
•	 Integrated storage that stays out of the way.
•	 4 liter (1 US gallon, 244 cu in) capacity.
•	 Easy on/off.
•	 Can be used with tunnel bags or fuel caddies.
•	 Vehicles with pull start require the Battery Cover 
(860201407).
•	 Thermoformed hard plastic base.
LinQ DEEP SNOW SEAT BOX
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow) without electric starter
860202668
•	 Low-profile integrated storage box utilizing the battery

•  Rotax® 900 ACE™ engine
• KYB 36 rear shock
• Multi-LinQ plate with 125 lb / 56.7 kg cargo capacity

• LTS telescopic front suspension
•  SC™-5U articulating rear suspension with locking 
mechanism (no tool required)
• Removable passenger seat with grips
• Ultra-high windshield with side deflectors
•  Hitch with an HD rear bumper 
• Air radiator with fan
• Standard electric start
• Deep snow running boards with large openings
•  Easy Shift transmission (H-L-N) with 
electro-mechanical reverse
• Pivoting mirrors
• pDrive™ clutch
• Low handlebar strap
• Pilot 7.4 skis 
• Available with 20 in. or 24 in. track options

messages.content:
List all technical specifications with their values:

2 UP SEAT WITH BACKREST
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X 400 mm
860202662
• The ultimate in modular seating. 
• Allows quick changes between 1-up and 
2-up riding. 
• Ergonomically correct positions for driver 
and passenger. 
• Two easy tool-less steps: 
1 - Clip in seat. 
2 - Add LinQ 1 + 1 Backrest. 
• Battery Cover with Support (860201720) 
required for vehicle without battery. 
• Anchor kit available 860202059 (when 
owning 2 sleds and want to change this seat 
easily to another sled) 
• On vehicles equipped with a battery, 
attach LinQ anchor on top of stock 
battery cover, or use kit 860201720
2 UP LIGHT SEAT
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X 400 mm
860202568
• Extended seat providing convenient 2-up riding. 
• Replaces existing seat in seconds. 
• Battery Cover with Support (860201720) required for vehicle without battery. 
• On vehicles equipped with a battery, attach LinQ anchor on 
top of stock battery cover, or use kit 860201720
50  ACCESSORIES  SEATS & ACCESSORIES
LinQ 1+1 RACK
Radien², Radien, Radien-X 400 mm
860202785  
860202414 • (except 850 E-TEC Turbo R models) 
• Required for LinQ Sport Passenger and LinQ Trail Premium Passenger Seat use. 
• Great looks with or without the passenger seat mounted. 
• Provides an additional LinQ position 0 (for soft accessories only)  
when passenger seat isn’t in use. 
• Made of lightweight die cast aluminum. 
• Retrofit for Radien & Radien-X 400 mm requires Driver Seat (860202781) 
or Driver Heated Seat (860202782) for installation.
LinQ PASSENGER SEAT HEATED GRIPS
Radien², Radien, Radien-X 400 mm
860202535
• Provides heat to the passenger grips.  
• Easy to disconnect when removing passenger seat. 
• Fits for Linq Passenger Seat Sport (860202325)
DRIVER SEAT FOR LINQ 1+1 SYSTEM
Radien², Radien, Radien-X 400 mm
860202781
• Designed especially to improve riding ergonomics on trail 
• Compatible with: 1+1 Rack 860202414 or 860202749, 1+1 sport seat 
860202325 or 860202917, 1+1 touring seat 860202536.
HEATED DRIVER SEAT
Radien², Radien, Radien-X 400 mm
860202782
• Makes riding more comfortable even in the coldest temperatures. 
• Long awaited option to 16” models 
• Compatible with: 1+1 Rack 860202414 or 860202749, 1+1 sport seat 860202325 or 860202917, 
touring seat 860202536. 
• Requires Harness (860202740) to retrofit on Radien models.
DEEP SNOW PRO SEAT
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X 400 mm
860202264
• Ultra compact design for active riders. 
• Low, narrow and light seat. 
• Allows easier side-to-side changes. 
• Provides great freedom of movement. 
• Integrated grip areas. 
• Stock on Radien² Shredder RE & DS models.

OILS & MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS
ENGINE OIL S
XPS 2T SNOWMOBILE PREMIUM MINERAL OIL
9779277 • 1 US gal / 3.785 L
•	 Powersport formula with premium anti-wear and anti-
corrosion additives.
•	 The carefully balanced additives optimize detergency 
and lubrication through a broad range of operating 
temperatures.
•	 Additional corrosion protection for wet environments and 
during storage.
•	 Safe for winter/snowmobile use.
XPS 2T E-TEC SYNTHETIC OIL
9779281 • 1 qt / 946 ml
9779282 • 1 US gal / 3.785 L
9779283 • 2.5 US gal / 9.46 L
9779284 • 5 US gal / 18.92 L
9779285 • 55 US gal / 205 L
•	 Specifically engineered to meet the unique needs of 
Rotax engines, it provides maximum protection against 
engine wear in E-TEC engines.
•	 Uses a highly effective package to keep engine parts 
lubricated, clean and free of wear.
•	 This low smoke, low odor formula also allows for maximum 
engine performance.
•	 Can be used in direct, semi-direct fuel injection system 
and high performance carburated 2-stroke engines.
XPS 2T RACING SYNTHETIC OIL
9779229 • 1 US gal / 3.785 L
•	 Specially designed for high-performance or racing 
engines.
•	 Top-performing synthetic oil is formulated with a highly 
evolved additive package that includes performance 
enhancing esters.
•	 Withstands extreme operating temperatures, high RPM 
and heavy loads to deliver competition-level engine 
protection.
•	 Use in high-performance 2-stroke snowmobiles and off-
road motorcycle engines.
XPS 2T SNOWMOBILE SYNTHETIC BLEND OIL
9779649 • 1 US gal / 3.785 L
•	 Designed for all oil injection or pre-mix 2-stroke 
snowmobiles with electronic fuel injection or carburated 
engines.
•	 Recommended engine oil for Rotax 600 EFI engine.
•	 Facilitates cold starting with low-smoke emissions.
•	 Ensures maximum protection against wear by keeping the 
engine parts lubricated and clean.
XPS 4T 0W-40 SYNTHETIC OIL CHANGE KIT
9779402 • 600 ACE
9779403 • 900 ACE
9779404 • 1200 4-TEC
•	 Ultra-convenient ”all-in-one” oil change kit saves time 
and money.
•	 Includes XPS Synthetic Oil, oil filter, O-rings and washer.
XPS 4T 0W-40 SYNTHETIC OIL
9779286 • 1 qt / 946 ml
9779287 • 1 US gal / 3.785 L
•	 Powersport formula with premium anti-wear and anti-
corrosion additives.
•	 The best choice for high-performance snowmobile, ATV 
and SXS 4-stroke engines used in cold weather.
•	 Provides superior engine and transmission protection 
against heat, rust and corrosion.
•	 Delivers optimal performance in high and low 
temperatures.
+40˚ C
+104˚ F
-45˚ C
-49˚ F
XPS 4T 0W-20 EXTREME COLD SYNTHETIC OIL
9779294 • 1 qt / 946 ml
9779295 • 1 US gal / 3.785 L
•	 EXTREME COLD engine oil is state-of-the-art, developed 
for easier cold starts in the most frigid, harshest winter 
climates.
•	 The custom formula promotes fast oil flow from the sump 
to critical engine components to ease starting.
•	 Protects 4-stroke snowmobiles, ATVs and power equipment 
from cold start engine wear.
+25˚ C
+77˚ F
-60˚ C
-76˚ F

messages.content:
List all technical specifications with their values:

MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS
EXTENDED LIFE PRE-MIXED COOLANT
619590728 • 1 qt / 946 ml
•	 Antifreeze/coolant contains the correct dilution and 
the necessary additives to prevent corrosion and inhibit 
cavitation in BRP cooling systems.
•	 Long-life, 5-year formula specially formulated for BRP 
vehicles.
•	 Superior heat transfer.
•	 Ideal replacement for vehicles that normally use a 2-year 
antifreeze/coolant (green).
•	 5 years (orange).
DOT 4 BRAKE FLUID
9779207 • 12 fl. oz. / 355 ml
•	 Meets or exceeds all DOT3 and DOT4 brake fluid 
requirements.
•	 High-temperature formula resists fade, and also conditions 
seals and O-rings in braking systems.
OIL FILTER
420956124 
•	 900 ACE, 900 ACE Turbo, 600 ACE and 1203 engines.
SYNTHETIC CHAINCASE OIL
9779185 • 12 fl. oz. / 355 ml
•	 Specially developed for high-performance Ski‑Doo models, 
it represents the best in state-of-the-art chaincase 
lubrication.
•	 This multigrade full-synthetic formula flows well at cold 
temperatures and won’t break down at high temperatures.
•	 Made with additives that protect internal components 
from wear and corrosion and also conditions seals.
•	 Not for use in 2-speed snowmobile transmissions on 
Expedition, Skandic utility models.
SYNTHETIC GREASE SUSPENSION
9779226 • 14 oz./ 400 g
•	 Designed to work specifically with the components found in 
Can-Am and Ski‑Doo vehicle suspensions.
•	 It is highly stable and offers optimal lubrication at both 
extreme cold and high temperatures while protecting 
suspension components from dirt and moisture, as well as 
corrosion under extreme washout conditions.
XPS ICE INTAKE COOLING ENHANCER
9779362 • 1 US gal / 3.785 L
•	 XPS Ice is a sophisticated blend of methanol and filtered 
water. 
•	 Specially formulated to cool the air intake charge of 
engines in the water injection system.
XPS SPLINE GREASE
9779472 • 4 oz.
•	 Enhanced rust and corrosion resistance.
•	 Protects against seizure, heat-freeze, galling, rust and 
corrosion.

OXYGEN HELMETS
UNISEX
•	 Visor equipped with an adjustable ventilation system to adjust the temperature 
inside the helmet according to the weather conditions. Our tests have shown a 
temperature reduction up to 10°C compared to the visor without a vent.
•	 4-year limited warranty.
•	 Sun visor heated chamber.
•	 Amplified heated visor with pivot contact system.
•	 Retractable amber sun visor.
•	 Prescription eyeglasses friendly.
•	 Adjustable humidity extractor vents.
•	 Unobstructed panoramic field of vision for an incredible maskless riding 
experience.
•	 Durable anti-fog and anti-scratch coatings.
•	 NCS: reduces noise.
•	 Robust detents allow precise opening adjustments for airflow.
•	 Optional front LED utility light.
•	 Lightweight batteryless rear LED light for added rider safety.
•	 E-LinQ rear magnet connector.
•	 Offered with amber sun visor for best vision in snow conditions.
•	 Ready to receive communication system.
•	 Operate all features with gloved hands.
•	 2 shell sizes for better fit and comfort.
•	 Ratcheting quick-release chin strap.
•	 Recyclable helmet shell for minimal environmental impact.
•	 Aerodynamic shape to reduce neck fatigue.
•	 DOT certified.
•	 Oxygen Helmet (DOT) with Lightweight M-FORGE® Composite shell.
